channel.description: Recent content in Action on Game Rift

item.title: Enigma of Fear
item.description: Game Description Enigma of Fear is a title that puts gamers in the shoes of Mia, a paranormal investigator on a personal mission: to find her missing father. Finding themselves in the Perimeter, a place that exists outside of reality, Mia and her dog Loopy are plunged into the unknown, where nothing is as it seems. The Perimeter is shrouded in mystery, filled with strange happenings, sinister creatures and a web of secrets that Mia must unravel.

item.title: One Boss One Fight
item.description: Game Description In One Boss One Fight players face one unforgiving enemy - Death. From the moment you enter the arena, every decision, every dodge and every blow becomes a matter of survival. This roguelike is built around one intense fight where the stakes couldn’t be higher. Death is not just an adversary, it is a force of nature, adapting and evolving with each stage. Combat unfolds in multiple layers, each more complex than the last, requiring precision and adaptation from even the most experienced players.

item.title: Snow Bros. Wonderland
item.description: Game Description Snow Bros. Wonderland is a new adventure of the beloved snowman duo Nick and Tom. This time around, the classic gameplay has been updated with a 3D isometric perspective, offering players new ways to interact with the icy world. The core mechanics remain the same: shoot ice pellets, turn enemies into snowballs, and send them flying to destroy everything in their path. Large bosses have appeared in the game, and to clear their path you will need a strategic chain of snowballs.

item.title: Renaissance Kingdom Wars
item.description: Game Description Renaissance Kingdom Wars is a rich blend of grand strategy and real-time strategy set against the backdrop of 1510. At the beginning of the game, you have nothing but a name - you are just a mercenary captain with dreams of greatness. Rise through the ranks, from lord to king, and make your mark on a vast world spanning Europe, Africa and the Middle East. The main thing in Renaissance Kingdom Wars is making strategic decisions.

item.title: Void Crew
item.description: Game Description Void Crew invites you to go on an exciting journey through space with your crew members. In this high-stakes interstellar odyssey, teamwork is paramount as you and your friends face the challenges of deep space together. You will find yourself at the helm of a modern spaceship, which will rush through outer space, performing the most ordinary tasks. Asteroid storms, solar flares and random mistakes by crew members - there is never a dull moment in the game.

item.title: ATLYSS
item.description: Game Description ATLYSS is an open world RPG adventure game that introduces gamers to a vast and surreal universe. It is filled with a variety of creatures and mysterious locations, inviting users to explore every corner of it. Users can choose how they interact with the world: collaborate with others or cope with difficulties alone. The dynamic nature allows them to adapt their style, fostering a sense of responsibility for their experiences.

item.title: Dungeon Clawler
item.description: Game Description Dungeon Clawler brings a fresh twist to the roguelike formula. It combines the familiar thrills of dungeon crawling with claw machine mechanics that put a twist on traditional gameplay. You navigate treacherous environments, but instead of directly grabbing weapons and armor, you rely on the claw to get you the loot you need. This adds strategic thinking, because every item you take out of the car can play a decisive role in the next battle or encounter.

item.title: Dark Honor
item.description: Game Description Dark Honor puts gamers in the shoes of a lone warrior on a path of revenge, navigating a dark world defined by a ruthless samurai tribe. The plot sets the stage for a personal quest imbued with the promise of retribution as the protagonist hunts down those responsible for deep personal loss. During this journey, combat comes to the fore, forcing users to learn the intricacies of its advanced system.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl is a first-person shooter in a post-apocalyptic world. The events of the game will develop in the exclusion zone formed as a result of the disaster at the Chernobyl nuclear power plant. In 2006, a new catastrophe occurred, which led to various physical, chemical and biological processes, creating many anomalies, artifacts and generating a large number of mutants. The gameplay is a classic FPS with elements of a role-playing game, immersive sim and horror.

item.title: RAM: Random Access Mayhem
item.description: Game Description RAM: Random Access Mayhem is a roguelike shooter that takes a familiar concept and turns it into something chaotic and strategic. In a world filled with bizarre robots, gamers take on the role of a disembodied AI programmed to wreak havoc. Unlike typical shooters, the adventure game features new mechanics: you control and switch between eight different types of enemies, each with their own unique abilities. This twist not only keeps the action fresh, but also requires quick thinking and strategy as you progress through increasingly difficult levels.

item.title: Incantation
item.description: Game Description Incantation is a first-person horror game that immerses gamers in the eerie world of Chen Village, where danger and mystery are never left behind. As the main character, a mother desperately searching for her missing daughter, users will have to navigate the web of secrets, rituals and cults that seem to seep from every crack in the village walls. The plot unfolds gradually, and with each step more and more information is revealed about the strange forces operating in the village.

item.title: Rogue Command
item.description: Game Description Rogue Command is a strategy with elements of a bagel and a card game. You need to collect resources, form a unique deck of cards and fight against robots. When gathering an army, you need to study the enemy’s tactics in order to deal a crushing blow to him. While exploring locations, you need to obtain resources to build buildings and hire units. There are factories, auxiliary buildings, turrets and special weapons of mass destruction.

item.title: 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR - Dank Dreams and Goated Memes
item.description: Game Description 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR - Dank Dreams and Goated Memes is a first-person shooter that stands out for its wild premise and unpredictable gameplay. The story follows a former Secret Service agent who leaves behind a life of danger and intrigue to pursue a quieter existence as an artist. However, peace does not last long. The agent is soon forced back into action to save memes from the clutches of the Illuminati, a shadowy organization that seems intent on controlling the internet’s most valuable content.

item.title: Space Trash Scavenger
item.description: Game Description Space Trash Scavenger takes place in a future where humanity has reached for the stars and survival means using what others have left behind. Here, gamers take on the role of scavengers operating in a galaxy littered with the rubble of an ancient conflict. The journey begins with a space drill - a multi-purpose node floating among the remains of abandoned ships, forgotten outposts and asteroid fields. This is not just a shelter, but a factory, equipped with critical systems for agriculture, defense and waste processing - all necessary to turn interstellar waste into something valuable.

item.title: TIME SOUL
item.description: Game Description TIME SOUL is an action-platformer with a unique approach to the usual souls-like genre. In a universe where time is both weapon and enemy, gamers will battle through procedurally generated worlds filled with treacherous platforms, unexpected obstacles and formidable enemies. Moving forward, users will fight with the guardians of time, collect fragments and clocks, trying to prevent the complete collapse of time. It’s a race against time, literally, as the ultimate goal is to defeat the Time Lord within a limited time of 60 minutes.

item.title: Beyond The Darkness
item.description: Game Description Beyond The Darkness is an adventure game that immerses gamers in a world of ghostly memories and disturbing experiences. The game follows the story of Millie, a young girl whose family mysteriously disappeared. Her journey takes her through several eerie, memory-based worlds, each more complex and disturbing than the last. The narrative revolves around Millie’s quest to discover the truth about her family’s fate while at the same time confronting the nightmares that seem to manifest themselves in the very fabric of her memories.

item.title: Bullet Runner
item.description: Game Description The dynamic shootouts in Bullet Runner show the adventures of a pixelated man who is forced to resist against a crowd of evil opponents. The game is a top-down action shooter where you have to fight with various opponents. The project is filled with fast and active gameplay, where users can test the speed of their reaction to current events. You’ll have to move around the map and shoot enemies using a wide arsenal of weapons.

item.title: Codex Lost
item.description: Game Description Codex Lost is an open-world role-playing adventure game that immerses gamers in a realm where magic, mystery and danger intertwine. Against the backdrop of a fractured world, users take on the role of the Guardian, a figure tasked with finding stolen grimoires and saving a reality on the brink of collapse. The stakes are high and the journey is filled with challenges, but what really sets the title apart is its focus on freedom, discovery and strategic combat.

item.title: LEGO Horizon Adventures
item.description: Game Description LEGO Horizon Adventures takes gamers on a whimsical journey through a future made entirely of LEGO bricks. Forget lush greenery and jagged rocks - even the colossal dinosaur-like machines that roam the earth are carefully sculpted from colorful bricks. Developed by Guerrilla Games and Studio Gobo, this action-adventure game takes inspiration from the critically acclaimed Horizon Zero Dawn. Take the place of Aloy, a curious girl raised by the stern but kind huntsman Rost.

item.title: Little Big Adventure – Twinsen's Quest
item.description: Game Description Little Big Adventure – Twinsen’s Quest, a reimagining of the classic adventure game, opens up new horizons of exciting virtual travel. This is a unique opportunity to plunge into a completely new world, full of exciting effects, rich musical compositions and deep gameplay mechanics. According to the plot, you have to go on a journey with Twinsen, an ordinary inhabitant of the Citadel Island. His calm life changes after a disturbing dream about the end of his planet and a meeting with the forbidden goddess Sendell, after which our hero finds himself imprisoned in a psychiatric clinic.

item.title: PARKOUR CIVILIZATION
item.description: Game Description Parkour Civilization invites players into a high-stakes world where every jump or wall run tests their accuracy and timing. At its core, the game challenges you to master increasingly difficult parkour tracks. Every successful jump propels you forward, and every fall serves as a reminder of the unforgiving nature of this fast-paced environment. The path from beginner to expert comes through practice, persistence, and the willingness to accept failure as part of the process.

item.title: Shave and Stuff
item.description: Game Description In Shave and Stuff, gamers find themselves in a lively and practical simulator, where two roles come to the fore - a hairdresser and a tattoo artist. The title combines hairdressing and paint work, which promotes creativity and experimentation. Whether performing precision cutting tasks or plunging into the complex world of body art, users are immersed in a world of tools, techniques and client preferences. A constant flow of tasks and light humor provide the basis for an original approach to customization and self-expression.

item.title: XENOTILT: HOSTILE PINBALL ACTION
item.description: Game Description XENOTILT: HOSTILE PINBALL ACTION transports gamers to a high-octane world where the classic game of pinball meets hostile forces for an intense blend of arcade action. The adventure follows the path of its predecessor, Demon’s Tilt, and brings familiar gameplay mechanics while adding many new challenges. Each new table offers a new set of obstacles, targets and bonuses that force users to be on their guard. Pinball here is not just about throwing a ball, it is a battle against time, enemies and your own reflexes.

item.title: Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age
item.description: Game Description Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age is a naval combat game in which you control two warring factions: NATO forces and representatives of the Warsaw Pact. Take part in the naval conflicts of the 80s. Control a huge number of different ships, use all modern types of weapons and technologies. Your main task in Sea Power: Naval Combat in the Missile Age is to defeat the enemy army.

item.title: HeistGeist
item.description: Game Description HeistGeist immerses gamers in the cyberpunk universe, putting them in the shoes of Alexandra, a cunning thief who overcomes the consequences of a failed mission. The title revolves around the challenge of assembling a diverse team of specialists to carry out complex heists. Each heist presents tactical obstacles and opportunities, turning each mission into a unique puzzle. Users take part in battles based on a card-based battle system that brings an innovative twist to the traditional strategy genre.

item.title: Locuras en el Banverso
item.description: Game Description Locuras en el Banaverso is a single-player platformer that takes gamers on a chaotic adventure through a bizarre multiverse. The game follows the eccentric YouTuber El Bananero, who not only plays the role of the main character, but also voices him. From the very beginning, El Bananero finds himself in an unexpected situation - he is kidnapped by none other than Santa Claus and his gang of henchmen. As fate would have it, the kidnapping turns into an escape through a portal that leads him into the depths of the multiverse.

item.title: Terror of the Seven Seas
item.description: Game Description Terror of the Seven Seas is a game that immerses gamers in the complex maritime life of an era of exploration and piracy. The game takes place in a vast open world and offers a wide range of entertainment - from participating in large-scale naval battles to treasure hunting. Users take on the roles of various characters, each with their own unique responsibilities and abilities. Whether it’s a captain leading a ship through stormy seas, an officer commanding a crew, a merchant transporting goods across vast oceans, or an explorer reaching into the unknown, there is something for every type of adventurer.

item.title: Gods Wars: Infinity Epic
item.description: Game Description Gods Wars: Infinity Epic is a pixelated roguelike that invites gamers into a world filled with relentless combat, strategic decision-making and rich customization. From the very beginning, the adventure game offers significant flexibility, allowing gamers to create their characters according to their playstyle and preferences. The plot is simple and at the same time fascinating: users will have to overcome waves of monsters, defeat powerful bosses and ultimately challenge the formidable evil gods.

item.title: Metal Slug Tactics
item.description: Game Description The Metal Slug Tactics player chooses his warriors to create a suitable powerful team capable of stopping the hostilities. Run n' Gun has roguelike elements as well as intense combat. The continuation of the series of the same name allows you to look at the war from a new angle with a greater share of adrenaline, gaining experience after each fight, which helps to unlock additional skills or weapons.

item.title: Warlords Battle Simulator
item.description: Game Description Warlords Battle Simulator is a game that places gamers in the role of generals who must lead armies in strategic and often unpredictable battles. In this tactical roguelike auto-action game, success largely depends on how well users manage resources, select units and place them on the battlefield. Each faction - be it the Kingdom, Greenskins, Undead or Barbarians - offers a unique set of units and commanders, each with special abilities that can change the tide of battle.

item.title: Emberdrift
item.description: Game Description Emberdrift is a fast-paced roguelike platformer that focuses on movement and upgrades. From the very beginning, gamers find themselves in an ever-changing world that requires quick reflexes and the ability to find new opportunities. The gameplay is built around speed, requiring users to navigate through a variety of levels with a range of mechanics designed to keep them on their toes. As players move through a randomly generated world, they can slide, wall jump, move diagonally, and even grab onto surfaces.

item.title: Rusty's Day Off: Episode One - Janitor on Duty
item.description: Game Description Rusty’s Day Off: Episode One - Janitor on Duty offers an original take on the first-person shooter (FPS) genre. The gamer will have to step into the shoes of Rusty, a janitor who is tasked with sorting out a situation at a workplace where a malfunction has occurred due to rogue robots. It’s not just running and gunning, there’s more to it than that. You’ll have to solve puzzles, interact with strange gadgets, and figure out how to stay alive while coping with mechanical chaos.

item.title: Sofie: The Echoes
item.description: Game Description Sofie: The Echoes is an adventure game that immerses gamers in an exciting storyline. The main character, Sophie, goes on a quest, guided by personal interests. In search of her husband and son, she goes through a world full of difficulties and trials. In this world, the boundaries between reality and echoes of the past are blurred. Every moment in the adventure feels weighty as users follow Sophie’s path through treacherous landscapes and emotional turmoil.

item.title: Monster High Skulltimate Secrets
item.description: Game Description Monster High Skulltimate Secrets invites users to go on an exciting adventure with the iconic characters of the franchise. The story centers on Draculaura, Frankie Stein and Clawed Wolf, who go on a search and try to eliminate the evil spirits that are haunting their school. This dynamic trio act as guides and companions, guiding gamers through various challenges and puzzles. Gameplay involves collecting keys from monsters hidden throughout the campus, each of which is needed to open an ancient door.

item.title: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split
item.description: Game Description Outbreak: Shades of Horror Chromatic Split takes users into the disturbing environment of Cypress Ridge, where chaos reigns amid a zombie outbreak. Set in the early moments of this disaster, gamers are given the choice of one of two different characters: Lydia, a seasoned police officer, or Hank, a figure shrouded in mystery whose goals differ sharply from Lydia’s. These choices affect how users interact with the narrative, resulting in different experiences as they navigate a city filled with danger.

item.title: Quadrober Simulator
item.description: Game Description Quadrober Simulator invites users to test themselves as a four-legged creature in a diverse environment. There is a lot of choice in this game. Users can choose from a variety of animals, each with specific traits and skills. These choices set the stage for a unique journey through different ecosystems. As gamers navigate these landscapes, they are faced with opportunities to explore, survive, and interact with the environment. Gameplay revolves around several key activities, including hunting, foraging, and building shelters.

item.title: Quarterstaff
item.description: Game Description Quarterstaff is a turn-based action strategy game that invites gamers into a fantasy realm full of intrigue and conflict. Set against the backdrop of a land under siege by a ruthless sorcerous conqueror, the adventure revolves around the character of Kalresh, a wizard skilled in the arts of magic and acrobatics. Having taken control of Kalresh, users are tasked with liberating the kingdom through a series of strategic battles.

item.title: Red Dead Redemption
item.description: Game Description The beginning of the 20th century was not easy in the Wild West in Red Dead Redemption. John Marston was previously a member of a gang of thugs, but decided to end his bloody occupation. The guy did not manage to start a quiet life - the hero was taken under the “guardianship” of government services, whose agents forced him to work for them. The character’s family was under their guns, and if they refused, John’s relatives would be killed.

item.title: Vengeance Hunters
item.description: Game Description Vengeance Hunters is a side-scrolling beat-‘em-up that captures the essence of classic arcade action. Here users can choose one of several characters, each of which has different abilities and fighting styles. These choices play an important role in how gamers approach gaming challenges. Going through various stages, users encounter many enemies, each of which has unique behavior and attack style. With a variety of characters, gamers will be able to find the fighting style that suits their preferences.

item.title: Soul Stalker
item.description: Game Description Soul Stalker is a bullet heaven-style roguelike that invites gamers into a world filled with ghostly challenges and addictive gameplay mechanics. In this game, gamers take on the role of a ghost manager as they navigate levels filled with unforgiving ghosts. Armed simultaneously with four to six types of weapons, users fight off waves of enemies trying to hinder their progress. This requires not only quick reflexes, but also strategic thinking as gamers choose how to use their arsenal against various threats.

item.title: Nuclear Nightmare
item.description: Game Description In Nuclear Nightmare, gamers join a specialized team on a mission in a challenging arctic wasteland. The task is to find secret materials while overcoming various threats, including the Black Goo virus. This virus creates menacing entities that raise the stakes, forcing users to act quickly. The backdrop is a race against time as the US government prepares to launch a nuclear strike, adding urgency to every decision the team makes.

item.title: Speedollama
item.description: Game Description Speedollama is a fast-paced platform shooter that takes gamers into a world where llamas battle an army of alpacas. The unusual premise draws users into a chaotic world where humor and action collide in the most unexpected ways. The goal is simple: control a llama equipped with a mining machine and destroy waves of alpaca enemies. The title features a vibrant environment filled with quirky characters and varied challenges, making every moment exciting.

item.title: Blazing Strike
item.description: Game Description Blazing Strike is a 2D fighting game that draws on the rich history of arcade games and brings new elements to the genre. Gamers can choose from 14 characters, each of which demonstrates their own fighting techniques and styles. The variety of characters makes the gameplay exciting and makes each fight unique. 11 stages to choose from allow users to get acquainted with different environments, each of which has its own flavor.

item.title: The Dawn: Sniper's Way
item.description: Game Description The Dawn: Sniper’s Way crosses a post-apocalyptic setting with a post-Soviet atmosphere. The game invites you to wander around Seversk. This is the name of a fictional industrial city. Previously, research laboratories and a nuclear power plant operated on its territory. In 1981, a disaster occurred there due to floods. After this, all residents were evacuated, and the settlement was abandoned. The video game itself takes place many years later, in 2025.

item.title: Thronefall
item.description: Game Description Thronefall is a game that truly captures the essence of strategy and action. Here, players are tasked with balancing resources, armies, and defenses while constantly facing waves of relentless enemies that relentlessly attack their base every night. The project offers users the freedom to choose their style, allowing them to either hold positions behind fortified walls and rely on archers and catapults to repel invaders, or take charge and lead their knights into exciting combat.

item.title: Shady Knight
item.description: Game Description Shady Knight is a first-person hand-to-hand combat game. The environment is interactive and contains a huge amount of dynamic combat. The gameplay combines elements of platforming. You will need to go through many towers and brutally tear apart your enemies. You use a sword with which you kill your enemies. You can also kick opponents onto spikes, shoot enemies with fire, and throw swords at their bodies to pin them to walls.

item.title: Undisputed
item.description: Game Description Undisputed is a sports simulator about boxing, where a special emphasis is placed on realism. Having created his own fighter, the player will have to go from amateur matches to the professional stage. The main goal will be to obtain the eWBC world title. Achieving this title will require constant honing of your skills, learning new techniques and choosing the right strategy. You can carefully choose your approach to each enemy and not take too many risks, or you can go for the trouble and show your full potential in every battle.

item.title: Monomyth
item.description: Game Description The narrative in Monomyth takes you to dark and gloomy times, immersing you in a dark fantasy atmosphere. Strong natural forces in the form of storms devastate the surface of the earth, which is why humanity has to go underground. The world is plunging into a period of chaos and hopelessness, making it increasingly difficult for ordinary people to survive; strife and civil strife begin, followed by the decline of civilization and culture of the human race.

item.title: Aim Camp
item.description: Game Description Aim Camp is an adventure game that combines military simulator and interactive gameplay. It immerses gamers in a variety of training exercises aimed at honing their aiming and accuracy skills. Each exercise presents users with unique challenges, including scenarios such as close combat, sniping and drone operations. Gamers immerse themselves in these drills, where the goal is not only competition, but also a deeper understanding of accuracy. The design of each scenario encourages a focused approach, requiring players to constantly adapt and improve their techniques.

item.title: Into the Necrovale
item.description: Game Description Into the Necrovale plunges you into a desperate fight for survival. As the Outsider, a doomed soul chosen by the All-Father, you hold the fate of a tormented world in your hands. Will you be his savior or his harbinger of doom? The choice is up to you. In the desolate Necroval, generations of exiled criminals fight for their existence. Hopeless, lost, forgotten - they are all bound by one rule: survive.

item.title: The Devil is in the Details
item.description: Game Description The Devil is in the Details is an adventure game that takes gamers into a labyrinth full of secrets and tension. Set in a mansion filled with traps and cursed objects, it takes participants on a journey of survival and strategy. The challenge is not only to escape, but also to clean up the environment. Gamers must find and place talismans on various cursed objects scattered throughout the mansion.

item.title: Banquet for Fools
item.description: Game Description Banquet for Fools is a party role-playing adventure game that invites gamers into a kingdom filled with pagan rituals and mysterious secrets. In this game, users take the place of a lord among the Vollins, an elven race distinguished by their slender forms and a troubled history of relationships with deities. Rejected by their gods, these creatures turn to paganism in search of the meaning of their existence. The setting is a cursed island, shrouded in mystery, where the user’s spice farms have inexplicably lost all their inhabitants.

item.title: Halluci-Sabbath of Koishi
item.description: Game Description Halluci-Sabbat of Koishi immerses users in a fantasy setting where they will have to take control of the monster Satori Komeiji Koishi, who is an adventurer and a trained soldier. During the adventure, the hero meets a human witch who is looking for rare ingredients to create potions. Traveling together, the protagonists stumble upon a dangerous mushroom family and undead that they have to fight. Players will explore the forest with miasma and encounter many opponents.

item.title: Start Over
item.description: Game Description Start Over is a multiplayer survival simulator set on a desert island, providing an immersive experience. You have to build a base, make the necessary equipment and defend against waves of enemies. The game features a realistic and dynamic environment where you need to adapt to constantly changing weather conditions, hunt animals, collect resources for survival and engage in trading items to earn money. As you explore the island, you can discover hidden secrets such as secret caves, ancient ruins, and even military camps.

item.title: Beyond Hanwell
item.description: Game Description Beyond Hanwell takes players to a post-apocalyptic London. Westminster, once a bustling hub, now serves as the backdrop to a complex journey of survival. Anomalies, a growing threat, inhabit the ruins of Hanwell. Gamers fight them using collected weapons or gadgets from the environment. The title offers more than just survival. She is a mystery. The director, a shadow figure, holds the clues. Side missions and hidden areas enrich the narrative.

item.title: Iron Meat
item.description: Game Description Iron Meat is a dynamic platformer made in the style of arcade shooters of the last century. The game takes place on Mars, when a group of scientists disappeared from radar without a trace. The case is entrusted to a member of an elite squad who goes in search of missing people. He must find out what really happened and who is behind this mysterious event. The gameplay takes inspiration from classic action games such as Contra.

item.title: Mechabellum
item.description: Game Description Mechabellum is an epic auto battler set in a sci-fi setting that puts you in the shoes of a commander leading an army of mechs on the newly colonized planet Far-Away. Your opponents will tremble in fear as you customize and level up your units, strategically place them on the battlefield and watch them ruthlessly destroy your enemies. You’ll have an arsenal of unique ‘Mechs at your disposal, from the nimble light craft of Wasps to the massive Vulcans.

item.title: Ravenswatch
item.description: Game Description Ravenswatch is a hardcore adventure in which you will need to explore a world captured by a terrible Nightmare. The gameplay is an isometric action role-playing game with procedurally generated locations. Battles are distinguished by their increased complexity and take place in real time. The gameplay is aimed at the player’s skill and creating a unique character build. Depending on the choice of the protagonist, weapons, equipment and a set of auxiliary items, the strategy of fights completely changes.

item.title: Shadows of Doubt
item.description: Game Description Shadows of Doubt allows gamers to plunge into the world of dark noir, which is shown in a sci-fi setting. Gamers will take control of a detective who is forced to deal with the case of a serial killer. The criminal is at large, committing hidden murders. The game is a first-person role-playing stealth adventure where you need to examine the surrounding area and interact with objects to find clues to the case.

item.title: The Forever Winter
item.description: Game Description The Forever Winter is a tactical survival horror shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Gamers navigate a landscape dominated by massive war machines locked in a relentless conflict. Here, special attention is paid to strategic decision-making and cooperation: gamers extract resources and fight for survival. The dynamic collision system ensures that enemies have their own goals and react intelligently to user actions, creating an unpredictable battlefield. In The Forever Winter, users form squads to plunder the dead and confront terrifying war machines.

item.title: Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed
item.description: Game Description Disney Epic Mickey: Rebrushed begins with a familiar face in a world that seems a little unfamiliar. Mickey Mouse is back, and this time users follow him through the Wasteland - a place where forgotten Disney characters and stories live. As users navigate this realm, they are given tools that shape the world around them. With brush in hand, they use paints and solvents to change the environment, alter the outcome, and shape Mickey’s path.

item.title: DreadHaunt
item.description: Game Description DreadHaunt is a 4v1 multiplayer horror and deception game in co-op and PVP. Here one of the users becomes possessed and turns into a ghost, and the rest must survive. The action takes place in a country plunged into chaos as a result of mass demonic possession. Gamers take on the role of an E-Class field agent tasked with securing, containing and protecting the source of evil to investigate and save the country.

item.title: GreedFall 2: The Dying World
item.description: Game Description GreedFall II: The Dying World takes the beloved original game to new heights, offering an even more exciting and challenging adventure. The RPG takes place three years before its predecessor and takes players to the old continent of Gakan, where they take on the role of a native of Tir Fradi, a land filled with danger and corruption. Here survival and the fight for freedom and homeland become paramount.

item.title: Halls of Torment
item.description: Game Description Halls of Torment invites you into the world of terrifying monsters in this unique action game with roguelite elements, where you will face new challenges and dangers in each game. Dive into the dark and ruthless dungeons where the lords of the underworld await you. Find treasures and magical artifacts, and assemble a team of heroes who will help you defeat the horrors emanating from the depths of the earth.

item.title: Anomalous
item.description: Game Description Anomalous takes users to the fictional and totalitarian city-state of Kosolov. Local authorities were able to brainwash the population and forced residents to work until exhaustion in order to get rich at the expense of others. One day, the leaders of an industrial and closed country began to experiment on people. They decided to increase the military potential of the power and began to conduct experiments on dead workers in order to revive them and force them to perform their duties again.

item.title: Witchfire
item.description: Game Description Witchfire suggests using not only weapons in the process, but also various devices in order to survive after an encounter with monsters. An arsenal consisting of dozens of different items and a variety of enemies will help gamers realize their own shooting skills. Challenge the most dangerous monsters that live in this world. Here it is important to select the right type of weapon in accordance with the situation and type of enemy.

item.title: Lorn's Lure
item.description: Game Description Lorn’s Lure is a dynamic action platformer with a first-person view, which was developed using retro graphics, reminiscent of the project of the 90s of the last century. The user is invited to try himself in the role of a lost android, who is forced to challenge himself with a difficult, almost impossible challenge, exploring a giant cave that has not been explored by his people before. It is quite difficult to move around the available locations, because the player is constantly surrounded by abysses, falling into which will mean returning to the control point, of which there are very few.

item.title: Pneumata
item.description: Game Description In Pneumata, residents disappear without a trace in the dimly lit corridors of Clover Hill. Their screams echo through the walls and blood seeps into the cracks. Your task as a detective is twofold: unravel the hidden truth within and reconstruct your fragmented memories, or succumb to the hidden horrors. Welcome to a game that defies reality and plunges you into a cosmic nightmare. Psychological and cosmic horror: Pneumata blurs the line between reality and alternate worlds.

item.title: Scary Shadow Spot: Last Farewell
item.description: Game Description Scary Shadow Spot: Last Farewell is a first-person psychological horror game that explores themes of grief, guilt, and the paranormal. Players take on the role of Mark, a man coping with the recent loss of his wife Jane. The game begins with Mark returning to his and Jane’s old country house to prepare for her funeral. However, what is meant to be a grim homecoming quickly turns into a terrifying ordeal.

item.title: The Karate Kid: Street Rumble
item.description: Game Description The Karate Kid: Street Rumble is a beat ‘em up title that immerses you in the world of the cult trilogy. Users step into the shoes of characters such as Daniel LaRusso, Mr. Miyagi, Ali Mills and Kumiko as they battle through various levels inspired by the films. The game has a side-scrolling format in which players face waves of enemies, including famous antagonists such as Johnny Lawrence, John Croesus and Terry Silver.

item.title: God of War: Ragnarok
item.description: Game Description God of War: Ragnarok continues the story of Kratos and Atreus as they explore a world inspired by Norse mythology. Events take place in ancient Norway. The events are dedicated to the beginning of Ragnarok. According to legend, it should lead to the death of all the Scandinavian gods, thereby marking the end of the world. Gameplay God of War: Ragnarok remains faithful to the original, but many new mechanics, enemies, abilities and locations have been introduced.

item.title: Toy Tactics
item.description: Game Description Toy Tactics is a colorful action strategy game that will take you into the world of exciting strategies and physics experiments. Here you will become the main general, tasked with controlling little toy soldiers and defeating the enemy. You will have to place units on the battlefield and create various formations to guide your toy army towards victory. But don’t forget that physics plays an important role here! When the toy soldiers collide with each other, their helmets will fly in all directions, just like in a cartoon.

item.title: Wild Indigo Ranch
item.description: Game Description Wild Indigo Ranch invites you to step into the boots of a cowboy and travel to the fictional and humorous Wild West. Whether you prefer single-player play or join forces with up to three friends in online co-op, flexible options are offered. Personalization is key, allowing you to customize your character, horse, and ranch to suit your unique style. Freedom reigns in the vast world of the game. You can roam the wild, hunt animals, search for gold mines, trade goods with other settlers, or engage in intense shootouts with bandits and lawmen.

item.title: Fera: The Sundered Tribes
item.description: Game Description Fera: The Sundered Tribes throws its hat into the action-RPG ring, but with a twist. You will not only have to smash the skulls of monsters, but also lead your tribe to restoration in a world devastated by magic. Imagine: A monster hunter by day, a mayor by night. The world of Fera is a post-apocalyptic mess, twisted by magic and infested with giant monsters that are eager to add your tribe to their menu of creatures.

item.title: Chains of Fury
item.description: Game Description Crazy shooter Chains of Fury with completely destructible levels. Lost or lost in the corridors? Just destroy all the walls with a shotgun! Up to 80% of the entire location will be broken, which will give complete freedom of movement. But you can’t fight with concrete alone. Aliens robots, creepy monsters and huge bosses - all this will need to be turned into bloody stains on the concrete.

item.title: Enotria: The Last Song
item.description: Game Description Enotria: The Last Song is not your typical push-button machine. This action RPG throws you into a world bound by a twisted, timeless game. You take on the role of Maskless, a wild card free of the scripted roles that everyone else follows. What is your task? Challenge the powerful Authors who support this disorderly spectacle. Masks are the main thing. Each of them gives you its own role and a unique set of abilities.

item.title: Hands of Necromancy 2
item.description: Game Description Hands of Necromancy 2 is a dark fantasy first-person shooter that picks up where its predecessor left off. You can play as one of two characters, each with their own special abilities and spells. The game has reworked the necromancy system, so you can use new weapons and learn powerful spells. Transformations are important, allowing you to transform into various creatures to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies. The game has many different environments: ancient castles, dry deserts, beautiful villages and creepy caves.

item.title: Judero
item.description: Game Description Judero immerses you in the world of strategic decisions and tactical battles. The title combines elements of role-playing and strategy, requiring gamers to go through various challenges and opponents. Users must manage resources, create alliances and make important decisions that will affect the outcome of their journey. In Judero, users encounter a variety of characters, each with unique abilities and history. These characters can be recruited into the player’s team, giving them various tactical advantages in battle.

item.title: Starstruck: Hands of Time
item.description: Game Description Starstruck: Hands of Time is an action role-playing game with rhythm game elements. Immersed in a vibrant world, you need to pick up a guitar to explore the rich environment. At the center of the story are two child guitarists. They confront three villains who want to rewrite the history of the world. The gameplay is based on time travel. In the year 30XX, humanity will disappear from the face of the earth.

item.title: Trail of Ayash
item.description: Game Description The world of Trail of Ayash is based on the myths and legends of the inhabitants. An open game location allows you to freely explore the area and learn more about the life of Native Americans. The player will encounter various tribes competing with each other, participating in diplomacy, organizing wars and expansion. The main character is Ayash, a respected man in his own faction. One day, a close person frames Ayash, and after that he is expelled from the tribe.

item.title: Edge of Sanity
item.description: Game Description Edge of Sanity immerses you in a chilling narrative. It’s not just about surviving the rugged Alaskan wilderness, it’s about battling with your own sanity as the harsh conditions erode your sanity. Imagine: you are cold, hungry and lost. Night falls and the only thing keeping the encroaching darkness at bay is the flickering fire. But wait, is that a growl in the distance or just the wind playing with your already frayed nerves?

item.title: Lucky Tower Ultimate
item.description: Game Description Lucky Tower Ultimate combines roguelike mechanics with a unique sense of humor. Gamers move through a dangerous tower, where every item can be used as a weapon. Here users will have to get out of the tower, overcoming various obstacles and enemies. Procedurally generated levels make each playthrough different, so no two are alike. The main character, von Vanst, continues his adventures in this part. Comedy and strategic gameplay are mixed here.

item.title: Panic In The Woods
item.description: Game Description Panic In The Woods is a survival and loot horror game that immerses gamers in a chilling woodland environment. The game can be played solo or in co-op with up to four gamers, playing as boy scouts lost in a haunted forest. The goal is simple: survive the relentless pursuit of the monstrous creature. Communication and strategy are of utmost importance. Users use walkie-talkies to coordinate their movements and exchange important information.

item.title: Surreal Farm
item.description: Game Description Surreal Farm is an adventure game that invites gamers into a vibrant world where imagination and strategy intertwine. Starting with a modest plot of land, gamers grow crops, care for unique animals and turn their farm into a thriving enterprise. As they progress, they discover many fantastical elements, from magical tools to surreal cultures and mythical creatures. The charm lies in the combination of casual gameplay and strategic depth.

item.title: Drill Core
item.description: Game Description Drill Core throws you headlong into the unforgiving depths of alien planets. You are in charge, tasked with managing a motley crew of miners and security guards. Their task? Extract valuable minerals and maintain the drill in working condition. Every swing of the pickaxe, every mounted turret - everything depends on your decisions. One wrong move can spell disaster for your team and the entire mission. But hold on, sunshine and cosmic rainbows don’t last forever here.

item.title: EVOTINCTION
item.description: Game Description EVOTINCTION is a futuristic hacking and stealth game that puts gamers in the role of Dr. Liu, a scientist running a research facility that has been taken over by rogue AIs. The core gameplay centers on using hacking skills to overcome robotic threats and uncover secrets vital to humanity’s survival. The facility is teeming with enemies, ranging from ordinary service robots to deadly, specially created killer bots. These robots follow specific patrol routes and work together under the guidance of a sophisticated artificial intelligence system.

item.title: Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines
item.description: Game Description Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines is a 2D action platformer that follows the adventures of Pablo and Luna. Users move through different dimensions, using unique abilities to overcome obstacles and enemies. It combines swinging, jumping and explosions to provide dynamic gameplay. In the title, gamers alternate between the characters Pablo and Luna. Pablo uses a grappling hook to progress through levels, while Luna brings her own set of skills to the table.

item.title: LOLLIPOP CHAINSAW RePOP
item.description: Game Description Lollipop Chainsaw RePOP is a fast-paced hack-and-slash that follows the adventures of Juliet Starling, a high school cheerleader turned zombie hunter. Juliet will face a new wave of the undead and a mysterious outbreak that threatens her hometown. Armed with her trusty chainsaw, Juliet must fight her way through hordes of zombies, from classic Shamblers to more grotesque and dangerous creatures. The combat system is smooth and enjoyable, with a variety of combos and attacks to keep gamers on their toes.

item.title: Stardiver
item.description: Game Description The underwater world of Stardiver amazes with its diversity. Under the water column lies an entire civilization that has adapted to this way of existence so that other forms of life do not bother them and do not start wars. Nevertheless, for humanity, a planet completely covered with water turned out to be more than a curious subject of research. The main character is the head of a scientific group for the study of extraterrestrial forms of civilization.

item.title: Wild Bastards
item.description: Game Description In Wild Bastards you’ll find yourself in the captain’s chair of a ragtag spaceship filled with the galaxy’s most notorious criminals. Think space pirates with a penchant for trouble. This isn’t your grandpa’s space opera, but a roguelike shooter where every decision can mean the difference between exploding into stardom or becoming cosmic dust. The missions are spread across a series of tactical campaigns, each of which is an adventure.

item.title: Demolish and Build 3
item.description: Game Description Demolish and Build 3 is a first-person simulator that puts you in the driver’s seat of a demolition company. You will complete orders and lead your team to victory using a variety of tools and heavy equipment. This game will test your skills as you manage your business and complete every project with precision and efficiency. A completely new realistic model of destruction will make you marvel at what you see more than once, since each fragment is physically simulated.

item.title: Trap Tower Trials
item.description: Game Description Trap Tower Trials presents a formidable challenge for gamers who will take on the role of a mysterious magician. The action takes place in a tower filled with unforgiving traps and obstacles designed to test your patience and skill. At each level of the tower, new dangers appear - from icy corridors to chambers imbued with magic - requiring precision and determination from users. The gameplay of Trap Tower Trials is linear and challenges gamers to scale unforgiving tower heights.

item.title: Elsie
item.description: Game Description Elsie is a side-scrolling action platformer with simplified roguelike elements. Each subsequent playthrough is different from the previous one. With any new run, levels are created randomly from hand-crafted parts. The order of loot also always changes. The locations themselves are non-linear. Before starting, you can add or remove modifiers to increase or decrease the difficulty accordingly. In the indie game you can run, jump, dash, bounce off walls, and shoot at opponents.

item.title: Hive Jump 2: Survivors
item.description: Game Description Hive Jump 2: Survivors is a sci-fi role-playing adventure game with action elements. In this adrenaline-pumping sequel to the acclaimed action-platformer, you’ll find yourself the only survivor of your squad, stranded on an alien planet. Armed with only your guns and your trusty jetpack, you set out on a mission of revenge. Here you have to fight relentless waves of killer insects. What is your goal? Destroy these swarms of aliens and collect their valuable entrails.

item.title: I Am Your Beast
item.description: Game Description I Am Your Beast is not your average shooter. This narrative-driven game throws you headlong into a brutal conflict with the shadowy organization you once worked for. You play as Alphonse Harding, a former operative who has been lured back into the world of underground warfare. Survival and thinking quickly are key. You’ll have to navigate treacherous terrain, dodging and fighting enemies in a high-stakes chase. Forget about going with guns at the ready.

item.title: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
item.description: Game Description Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland is a new action-platformer that brings beloved characters from the 1990s Nickelodeon series into a vibrant, imaginative world. Together with Tommy, Chucky, Phil and Lil, users will go on an adventure inspired by their favorite video game character, Reptar. The title features a unique co-op design that allows gamers to form teams and complete various levels located in the Pickles' home. The gameplay of Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland revolves around exploration and teamwork.

item.title: Towerborne
item.description: Game Description Towerborne is an action-adventure game set in a world where humanity’s cities have been destroyed by a mysterious evil. The only refuge is the Bell Tower, a tower that holds secrets and dangers. Gamers take on the role of Ace, a hero tasked with protecting the inhabitants of the Belfry and uncovering the truth about the evil threatening humanity. Here gamers explore a huge world filled with various creatures and challenges.

item.title: Yars Rising
item.description: Game Description Yars Rising is an exciting adventure game that will take gamers on an exciting journey through a dystopian future. In the role of Emi Kimura, an experienced hacker, you have to infiltrate the mysterious QoTech corporation. This shadowy organization holds secrets that could potentially change the world. The gameplay is a delightful mixture of 2D platforming, stealth and hacking. As Amy, you’ll navigate intricate levels, dodging laser bars, outsmarting security drones, and solving challenging puzzles.

item.title: Arcane Blast
item.description: Game Description In Arcane Blast you’ll find yourself wearing the fur boots of Adrian, a cat mage on a mission. This roguelike adventure throws you into a chaotic world filled with spells, enemies, and the constant threat of a cat’s life. Do you think you can handle it? This isn’t your average walk in the park, unless that park is filled with evil goblins and fire-breathing lizards. It’s all about reflexes here.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 is a cinematic 3rd person sci-fi action game set in a dystopian future where humanity is under siege by an implacable enemy - the Tyranids. As a Space Marine, you take on the role of a superhuman warrior tasked with defending the Imperium from an impending threat. Gamers are offered the opportunity to embody the image of the greatest warrior and show their incredible skill and cruelty in epic battles on distant planets.

item.title: Zero Hour
item.description: Game Description Zero Hour is a multiplayer tactical first-person shooter with realistic game mechanics that replicate the behavior of real special forces units in anti-terrorist operations. The setting for the action is criminal Bangladesh, where banditry is at a high level and is not going to give up ground to law enforcement officers. The locations where clashes between groups of terrorists and special forces occur are made using real scale, which greatly helps the atmosphere and involves gamers in the gameplay.

item.title: Castle of Lord Velimir
item.description: Game Description Castle of Lord Velimir takes users on a dangerous journey with the titular hero, a warrior seeking atonement for the sins of humanity. As Velimir journeys through the dungeons, wastelands, and mysterious underworld of Agartha, he will face countless challenges and uncover the secrets of his world. The gameplay is a mixture of strategic combat and exploration. Users must master a variety of fighting techniques to defeat a variety of enemies, each requiring a different approach.

item.title: CORPUS EDAX
item.description: Game Description CORPUS EDAX is an exciting first-person action RPG with close combat that will take you to a distant planet. Create your own character and unleash your inner warrior as you fight, sneak, or escape difficult situations. The choice is always yours - and it is always the right one. Use your body, ingenuity, and improvised weapons to make your way through this stunning new world. Thanks to the A.

item.title: Guns And Draguns
item.description: Game Description Guns And Draguns is a top-down co-op shooter that plunges gamers into a dangerous fantasy dungeon. Here users will have to go through various levels, destroying fantasy monsters with weapons. The main goal is to defeat the final boss, but along the way there are enemies and obstacles that require strategic teamwork and cooperation. Gamers can choose one of seven unique characters, each of which has its own abilities.

item.title: Smells Like a Mushroom
item.description: Game Description Smells Like a Mushroom is a sci-fi third-person shooter that takes gamers on a journey through the Milky Way. At the center is an invasion of creatures known as Magic Mushrooms. Users take on the role of Carrotado, a brave character tasked with preventing disaster. The gameplay includes platformer and shooter mechanics, and missions take place on various planets in the solar system. Smells Like a Mushroom’s narrative is driven by an absurd story and features both single-player and co-op modes.

item.title: Ale and Tale Tavern
item.description: Game Description Ale and Tale Tavern is a first-person, open-world co-op fantasy tavern simulator. Gamers step into the role of a tavern owner tasked with restoring an abandoned establishment to its former glory. The title offers a variety of activities including cooking, fishing, hunting and exploration. Users can complete a variety of quests, interact with unique characters, and manage various aspects of the tavern, such as decoration and crafting. The gameplay of Ale and Tale Tavern allows you to play both alone and in co-op - up to four users can work together.

item.title: Hit of Chernobyl
item.description: Game Description Hit of Chernobyl immerses users in a post-apocalyptic environment where survival is of paramount importance. Finding themselves in an area contaminated by an unspecified disaster, gamers take on the role of an adventurer. He must navigate a landscape full of dangers, not only from the environment, but also from other characters. The world is populated by marauders, journalists and thrill seekers, each with their own motives. Finding unique artifacts becomes the main task, requiring users to overcome a landscape replete with difficulties.

item.title: Selfloss
item.description: Game Description Selfloss is an atmospheric adventure set in a fantasy setting. The plot centers on a lonely old man, and the game itself is inspired by ancient Russian and Icelandic legends. Travel through the isometric world using your magic staff. Fight against numerous mythical creatures from Slavic fairy tales and myths. Help everyone who needs it. Pass many tests to perform a secret self-floss ritual that can heal a wounded soul.

item.title: Skoof Simulator
item.description: Game Description Skoof Simulator will introduce gamers to the life of Skoof, an ordinary worker whose everyday life is not like a routine. The title combines simulation and adventure elements, offering a unique and sarcastic look at everyday activities. Players guide Skuf through a variety of missions, ranging from factory shifts to humorous and unexpected situations. Users will have to manage Skuf’s life, making decisions that affect the outcome of his adventures.

item.title: The Moon 2044
item.description: Game Description The Moon 2044 takes place in a secret research facility on the Moon, where gamers take on the role of a genetically modified commando codenamed XV-11. The mission is to retrieve priceless samples from the depths of a lunar base that has fallen into darkness and is now overrun by hostile creatures. The facility, originally intended for experimental cancer research, hides many dark secrets that users will have to uncover.

item.title: BAKERU
item.description: Game Description The adventure of BAKERU, set in fantasy Japan, revolves around a tanuki boy named Bakeru. His mission is to restore order after the chaos unleashed by Oracle Saitaro and his Festival Army. Armed with a mystical drum, Buckaroo sets out on a journey to free Japan from evil spirits. BAKERU takes place across 50 scenes inspired by Japanese prefectures. This vibrant world combines modern Japan with echoes of period dramas to create a captivating backdrop.

item.title: We Heist Too
item.description: Game Description We Heist Too takes place in Rivadorium, a city where nothing ever stays the same. Users get used to the role of a thief, move silently through the streets, plan and carry out high-stakes robberies. This world doesn’t require much care, and from the very beginning you will notice that every corner of the city is fraught with opportunity. But the tricky part is knowing which opportunities are worth pursuing.

item.title: Sumerian Six
item.description: Game Description Sumerian Six is not your typical war story. Sure, it throws you right into the middle of World War II, but it’s an alternate history where whispers of folklore and conspiracy theories are as real as the Nazi threat. You take command of Enigma Squad, a strange team of scientist-soldiers. These are brainy people who can outwit and outwit their enemies. Their mission? Prevent the Third Reich from getting its hands on occult weapons.

item.title: FALLEN
item.description: Game Description FALLEN is an adventure game that immerses gamers in a post-apocalyptic world where the main goal is survival. Users navigate desert landscapes, encountering various challenges that test their resourcefulness and decision-making skills. The title places an emphasis on exploration and interaction with the environment, requiring gamers to scavenge for supplies and manage their inventory efficiently. In FALLEN, users encounter a variety of characters, each with their own story and motivation.

item.title: Kamikaze Lasplanes
item.description: Game Description Kamikaze Lassplanes is a visual novel that combines the plot of a novel with the action of a shoot-‘em-up game. Set in a steampunk world, the dramatic storyline involves two powerful weapons, Lassplanes, and two girls who become them. Gamers navigate a war-torn kingdom and make choices that affect not only the fate of the kingdom, but also their own hearts. The project introduces Alba Trosset and Hannah Brandenburg, two girls who transform into deadly warplanes.

item.title: Unstoppable: Breakout
item.description: Game Description Unstoppable: Breakout is an adventure game in which gamers find themselves in a chilling complex, leaving them alone and confused. Guided by the voice of a colleague, the protagonist, a researcher, must navigate dark and mysterious corridors, battling inhuman experiments and uncovering hidden secrets. The game is an intense mix of strategy and combat, requiring careful resource management and precision in every strike. The gameplay of Unstoppable: Breakout is an exciting roller coaster ride with challenging combat and boss battles.

item.title: Akimbot
item.description: Game Description Akimbot throws you into a metal menagerie! Teaming up rogue robot Exe with unexpected partner Shipset, this game throws down the galactic gauntlet. Imagine: you are fighting your way through hordes of robotic enemies, spaceships at the ready, and all this in order to stop a universal catastrophe. Fasten your seat belts, because this is not an easy ride. Akimbot isn’t all button-mashing chaos. It’s a strategic dance with enemies to dodge and outwit in every level.

item.title: Call of Sentinels
item.description: Game Description Call of Sentinels plunges you headlong into an epic struggle against the forces of darkness. Choose your champion from a growing list, each with unique skills and fighting styles. Hone your combat skills against the relentless hordes in the Arena, or take on dangerous journeys across varied landscapes in Campaign. Unleash devastating combos and master tactical maneuvers to defeat treacherous enemies and colossal bosses. Each victory unlocks valuable upgrades, expanding the hero’s capabilities and shaping his legend.

item.title: CarX Street
item.description: Game Description The CarX Street car simulator allows you to build your own car and hit the streets to conquer the whole city. The metropolis is presented on a huge scale, including its surroundings: city streets, industrial area, picturesque highways, etc. CarX Streets features drifting, high-speed chases, heavy traffic and intense competition in online races. The main feature of the game is the possibility of deep car customization and wide tuning possibilities.

item.title: DEATH IN UNISON
item.description: Game Description DEATH IN UNISON is a co-op survival adventure game set in an isolated rehabilitation institute on Corton Island. Here gamers will have to survive in the fight against some of the most dangerous criminals in the world, many of whom have supernatural powers. Users must perform their prison duties alone or with a partner, relying primarily on radio communications to navigate the treacherous environment. Gameplay in DEATH IN UNISON revolves around completing administrative tasks and protecting yourself from hostile prisoners.

item.title: ENDLESS DAYS Z
item.description: Game Description ENDLESS DAYS Z immerses gamers in a desolate, post-apocalyptic world devastated by DeltaVirus-7. As the leader of a group of survivors, you must overcome treacherous obstacles, collect vital samples, and confront hordes of the undead as you desperately search for a cure. The gripping narrative and intense gameplay make the game appealing to fans of survival horror and action games. The gameplay of ENDLESS DAYS Z is based on exploration, combat and resource management.

item.title: Gori: Cuddly Carnage
item.description: Game Description Gori: Cuddly Carnage is a dynamic action game with platformer and horror elements. You find yourself locked in with crazed toys out for blood. Using a special surf, you will have to cut circles around the location and chop up monsters. You will play as an anthropomorphic kitten riding a hoverboard. Chop unicorns and don’t get caught by a huge gorilla, eager to devour the protagonist. The gameplay of Gori: Cuddly Carnage has been jokingly described as Skate and Slash.

item.title: Gundam Breaker 4
item.description: Game Description GUNDAM BREAKER 4 hits the gaming scene with a bang as part of the heist gaming franchise. It’s all about building and fighting with a set of Gundam models, a concept fans are very familiar with. However, adventure games breathe new life into this formula, offering a deeper and more expansive experience. Customization is the cornerstone of the game. An extensive library of over 250 base sets provides the foundation for creating the Gunpla of your dreams.

item.title: Squirrel with a Gun
item.description: Game Description Squirrel with a Gun offers a unique experience. Users control a squirrel armed with a gun. Target? Collect golden acorns in a secret underground vault. The squirrel that haunts the neighbors becomes a hero. Gamers move through a sandbox filled with puzzles and enemies. The facility serves as a playground for chaos. To survive, the squirrel uses weapons, claws and teeth. The gameplay combines shooting and platforming. Users collect golden acorns - a squirrel’s obsession.

item.title: Star Command Galaxies
item.description: Game Description Star Command Galaxies is a space simulator in which you play as a ship captain. You need to build your own shuttle, recruit staff and go explore the randomly generated expanses of outer space. Manage your staff, collect resources, fight the alien threat and upgrade your ship. Clear the galaxy from enemies and various parasites. Fight pirates, zombies and many other opponents. You need to monitor the status of your team.

item.title: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash
item.description: Game Description Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash is a colorful spin-off that departs from the traditional racing focus. The title is evolving into a playful, party-oriented title. Gamers are immersed in a pixelated world teeming with familiar Umamusume. The Slapdash Grand Prix, the centerpiece, unfolds like a chaotic school festival. Four different events promise laughter, competition and unexpected twists. The pixel relay will spark the fun. Time plays a crucial role in Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash.

item.title: Supermoves
item.description: Game Description Supermoves - This parkour party promises wild fun. Users sprint, jump and grind the rails in intense challenges. Bomb Tag, Rising Tide and Royale modes offer different thrills. Up to forty gamers can race, pursue and compete. Makea Games' level editor allows users to create their own experiences. Makeaverse is waiting for you. Everyone can dive in, build and play. Supermoves combines competition and creativity. Casual players and parkour professionals will find their place.

item.title: PROTOCOL 11 - Episode 1
item.description: Game Description PROTOCOL 11 - Episode 1 is a journey through many worlds as Phil goes on a quest for justice. This is an exciting adventure in which gamers must return what was stolen by a strange race of invaders. The story touches on themes of friendship, love and the essence of humanity. Users mine resources, fight enemies and choose between direct combat and stealth. Gameplay involves jumping on platforms, shooting, and solving puzzles.

item.title: The Land of the Magnates
item.description: Game Description The Land of the Magnates tells the story of fallen prince Shahbaz, who is tasked with restoring a kingdom shrouded in darkness. The project does not hand the players a sword, but instead puts a sitar in their hands. This is not a hack-and-slash adventure game. No, this is a journey of melody and power, where puzzles replace sword fights. Shahbaz’s adventure takes place through fantastical landscapes. The black forest, the damned expanses, tests your courage.

item.title: 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far
item.description: Game Description 9-Bit Armies: A Bit Too Far is a real-time strategy game developed by Petroglyph Games, a continuation of the 8-Bit Armies series. Gamers lead modern military forces across various battlefields, participating in land, sea and air battles. The project offers more than two dozen missions, online skirmishes and cooperative play. A base construction system has been implemented in which players build structures, unlock units and launch attacks. The game is designed for both new and experienced RTS players with an easy to learn interface but a challenging skill ceiling.

item.title: Rum and Gun
item.description: Game Description Rum and Gun uses a pirate theme as its setting. The hero travels through the lands located in the Indian Ocean, fighting on land with people and monsters. He is trying to stop the captain, who has enlisted the help of evil forces. He also has to learn the secrets of the Drunken God. The plot is presented with jokes and self-irony. History is divided into acts. This is an isometric shooter and action game with role-playing elements.

item.title: Selene's Unbearable Night
item.description: Game Description Selene’s Unbearable Night is a third-person survival horror game that immerses gamers in a tense and atmospheric atmosphere. The title tells the story of Selena, a woman who finds herself in a difficult situation and is forced to overcome various dangers in order to survive. Users will have to search for key items, solve complex puzzles and confront numerous threats in order to complete the game. Selene’s Unbearable Night’s narrative unfolds through dialogue and cinematography, offering a deep dive into the characters' motivations and backstories.

item.title: Finding Mosey
item.description: Game Description In Finding Mosey, your feline companion Mosey has mysteriously disappeared. You go in search of him, and your path will depend on the choice you make. Developed by youpiepoopie, this single-player third-person RPG offers a refreshing blend of exploration, storytelling, and whimsical interactions. The search begins. Imagine waking up during a peaceful hike to find Mosey nowhere to be found. This seemingly simple premise turns into an exciting adventure.

item.title: Black Myth: Wukong
item.description: Game Description Black Myth: Wukong is a role-playing game based on the famous Chinese novel Journey to the West, written back in the 16th century. The gameplay is a journey through a semi-open world, reminiscent of a metroidvania. The developers cite the Souls series as their main source of inspiration. The story centers on a hero named Sun Wukong, who is also known as the Monkey King. He travels through a fantasy world, simultaneously fighting with various phantasmagoric creatures.

item.title: Crime Scene Cleaner
item.description: Game Description Crime Scene Cleaner is an unusual simulator in which you clean up traces of a crime. As soon as the customer calls you, and usually this is the mafia boss, you need to rush to the crime scene and wield a brush, a mop and many other tools. If you find yourself in a room full of corpses and blood, pull yourself together and do the job professionally. Don’t give investigators a chance to find the killer.

item.title: Nova Drift
item.description: Game Description Nova Drift is a top-down action RPG adventure. The gamer has the opportunity to test his strength in piloting a space fighter, forced to fight enemies that are superior in numbers and firepower. The spaceship uses unusual technologies; it is created using biomechanics, which means that it seems to be alive and is constantly changing both in appearance and in terms of available weapons. Thanks to the addition of artificial intelligence trained in procedural random generation, the developers from a small indie formation were able to achieve almost endless replayability.

item.title: Five Nights at Freddy's: Into the Pit
item.description: Game Description Five Nights at Freddy’s: Into the Pit immerses players in time-bending horror. Oswald, bored with everyday life, stumbles upon a portal to the past in the ball pit of an old pizzeria. His desire for thrills quickly turns into a nightmare when he finds himself trapped in a deadly game of cat and mouse. The player will have to move between different eras, piece together clues and elude relentless animatronic pursuers.

item.title: UBOAT
item.description: Game Description UBOAT is a unique simulator of submarine control during the Second World War. Observe and take direct part in the life of German submariners in the midst of war, when at any moment their refuge could turn into the place of their death. Survive in the open world and control all processes occurring on the submarine. Your players must be well-fed and energized so that your gameplay is not doomed to failure.

item.title: Nine Sols
item.description: Game Description Adventures in Nine Sols take players into an oriental fantasy setting where they will have to fight against 9 Sols. The game is a 2D platformer with soulslick elements, where you have to face unique bosses. Events take place on the territory of New Kunlun, which is a refuge for survivors. The ancient gods abandoned mortals, forcing them to confront dangerous monsters. A hero named Yi has arrived from the distant past to defeat mythological creatures.

item.title: WARNO
item.description: Game Description Tactical battles in WARNO take place in real time, where users will be able to take control of modern combat vehicles and go to the front, plunging into the Third World War. The game is made in the genre of strategy and army command simulator, where you need to think through the movement of units and observe the events taking place. The storyline is about a coup that occurs after Gorbachev leaves, creating a tense conflict between states in 1989.

item.title: Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT
item.description: Game Description In Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR’S CUT the twilight of the 13th century begins. The Mongol Empire massacred many peoples as part of a campaign whose goal was to conquer the East. Between mainland Japan and the mighty Mongol fleet, commanded by the legendary General Khotun Khan, lies only the island of Tsushima. And he is conquered, small villages are destroyed. Samurai Jin Sakai remained the last of the great clan.

item.title: ANIMAL WELL
item.description: Game Description In ANIMAL WELL players must explore a vast labyrinth created in pixel art. Players will interact with the interactive environment, pick up objects and combine them with each other, solve spatial puzzles, overcome landscape obstacles and much more. The character has to move around two-dimensional locations with a side view, periodically encountering dangerous monsters. It is necessary to illuminate dark areas on the map by lighting special candles.

item.title: Rabbit and Steel
item.description: Game Description Rabbit and Steel is a co-op action roguelike that will take you into epic battles. Choose your class, gather your bunny friends and fight to the top of Moon Peak. Months ago, all ties with the Moonlight Kingdom were severed. It is reported that the city’s residents are attacking all newcomers. Exploratory expeditions are repulsed or go missing. Every night, a huge white tower appears in the center of the city, reaching towards the stars.

item.title: V Rising
item.description: Game Description Waking up in V Rising, the hero as a vampire must hunt for blood, while simultaneously avoiding direct sunlight. The survival slasher film puts you in the shoes of a bloodsucker who wakes up in his own castle and must regain his possession and authority while operating in a vast open world full of secrets. Here you have to conquer the lands of the living, unite with allies to complete the task.

item.title: Hades 2
item.description: Game Description Hades II, the sequel to the award-winning roguelike dungeon crawler, takes players beyond the underworld. You play as Melina, a princess of the underworld, who uses dark sorcery to fight the Titan of Time. Supergiant Games builds on the success of the original game with intense action and endless replayability. Explore a deeper mythical world rooted in Greek myth and witchcraft. The story unfolds through victories and failures, keeping you on your toes.

item.title: Abiotic Factor
item.description: Game Description Abiotic Factor throws you into an underworld of chaos. Scientists, humanity’s brightest representatives, become survivors when faced with a multifaceted threat. When the protective shell is breached, horrors burst to the surface, and soldiers from another dimension invade the world. Meanwhile, a secret military sect hunts for artifacts and entities, adding to the chaos. Trapped miles underground, escape seems impossible. But you and your fellow scientists are not ordinary people.

item.title: Manor Lords
item.description: Game Description Manor Lords is a strategy game set in the Middle Ages. The game mechanics center on the realistic process of constructing buildings and intense fights with the enemy army. The building element is based on historical data about cities and villages. All buildings presented in Manor Lords are as authentic as possible. Landscapes and types of terrain influence the process of settlement formation. Create trade routes, establish market relations with neighboring cities and promote the economic prosperity of the settlement.

item.title: Another Crab's Treasure
item.description: Game Description Another Crab’s Treasure is an exciting underwater adventure created by AGGRO CRAB. You take on the role of a hermit crab named Creel, who goes on a dangerous treasure hunt to get back his stolen shell. In this unique underwater kingdom, on the verge of destruction, garbage is not only part of life, but also a valuable resource used to create fashionable outfits and weapons. However, with the garbage comes a mysterious danger - “slurry” - which threatens to destroy the entire ocean.
