item.title: Bellwright
item.description: Game Description Bellwright throws you into a world of rebellion and intrigue. Finding yourself in prison for a heinous crime, you must not only clear your name, but also organize a revolution against a tyrannical ruler. Build and manage settlements, collect resources and recruit villagers into your ranks. Each new adept brings valuable skills, strengthening your rebellion and unlocking new technologies for your cities. Combat is based on skill and focus.

item.title: Dead Island 2
item.description: Game Description Dead Island 2 is a continuation of the first-person zombie action game of the same name. The events of the game start a few months after the end of the first game. The virus has reached sunny California. The entire territory was cordoned off by US troops. Dead Island 2 includes many features that expand on the ideas of Left 4 Dead. The hero finds himself in the center of a zombie apocalypse and somehow miraculously survives.

item.title: No Rest for the Wicked
item.description: Game Description No Rest for the Wicked immerses players in a world ravaged by death and despair. Developed by Moon Studios, the creators of Ori and the Blind Forest, this action RPG promises challenging combat and deep human storytelling. The kingdom mourns the death of King Harol, leaving his untested son Magnus on the throne. Meanwhile, an ancient plague known as the Blight returns, corrupting the land and its inhabitants. Amid the chaos, Madrigal Celine, hungry for power in the church, seeks to use the crisis for his own selfish purposes.

item.title: Buckshot Roulette
item.description: Game Description Two enter, one leaves. That’s the motto of Buckshot Roulette, a horror game that takes the classic game of Russian Roulette and turns it into a high-stakes shotgun game. Immerse yourself in the dark atmosphere of an underground nightclub, where metal railings beat to the beat of forgotten drum kits and the stakes couldn’t be higher. This is not Russian roulette. This is where you swap the revolver for a 12 gauge shotgun, because shotguns are just better, right?

item.title: Content Warning
item.description: Game Description Content Warning throws players into the world of horror content creation. Team up with friends, create your own pixelated face using the in-game ASCII customizer, and grab your gear. Then descend into the spooky Old World using the diving bell. The Old World is crawling with creepy, physics-based monsters and cursed relics just waiting to be captured on camera. Capture as much creepy content as you can before you run out of oxygen, your camera dies, or worse, your friends become fodder for the monsters.

item.title: Outpost: Infinity Siege
item.description: Game Description Outpost: Infinity Siege is a fun sci-fi first-person shooter with elements of base building and tower defense. You command the Mobile Outpost and go with the Protoslug Cannon to deeply explore the forbidden zone of Cygnet, where many dangers await you. Collect unique weapon units and strengthen the firepower of the outpost that is fighting with you. This game combines elements of TD, FPS and RTS at the same time, making the gameplay incredibly exciting.

item.title: Dragon's Dogma 2
item.description: Game Description Dragon’s Dogma 2 takes players on a single-player adventure, immersing them in an action-packed action RPG where choices define the path. Players are encouraged to customize their experience, from the appearance of their Arisen to strategic decisions in combat and party composition. Throughout the quest, players are accompanied by pawns - mysterious creatures that simulate the multiplayer experience of a single-player adventure, enriching the gameplay with a variety of perspectives.

item.title: Midnight Ghost Hunt
item.description: Game Description Midnight Ghost Hunt is a creepy version of hide and seek in which players will have to catch ghosts or, on the contrary, drive away people who disturbed the peace of the spirits. 4v4 confrontation takes place between friends or random users. The main task of the hunters is to catch all the evil spirits with the help of their equipment, and the ghosts are to kill all living things by any means.

item.title: Horizon Forbidden West
item.description: Game Description Horizon Forbidden West – continuation of the adventures of the hunter Aloy, from the Nora tribe. In this part, the heroine finds herself on the coast of the former United States, where she will encounter new obstacles and deadly machines. You will have to use your bow and your ward’s abilities to confront your opponents and find out the secret of the islands. Watching Aloy from a third person, the user navigates the open world, completing main and side quests.

item.title: STAR WARS: Battlefront Classic Collection
item.description: Game Description STAR WARS: Battlefront Classic Collection brings back the beloved online shooters, remastered for modern consoles and PC. Players can now relive classic battles from the Star Wars galaxy, both online and offline, in this new collection. The collection includes the original game, as well as a bonus map: Jabba’s Palace. The second game, Battlefront 2, includes four bonus cards and two bonus heroes: Asajj Ventress and Kit Fisto.

item.title: The Outlast Trials
item.description: Game Description The Outlast Trials - first-person horror game in the Outlast universe. The difference from the main series is that you can play both alone and in a company. At the center of the story is the Murkoff company, which is engaged in inhumane and sadistic experiments. You will play as one of these crazy organizations. You can join forces with up to 4 people and try to survive this nightmare together.

item.title: Secrets of Grindea
item.description: Game Description Secrets of Grindea is an interesting adventure game in which you will need to take control of a hero and go on a long journey through a huge fantasy world in search of new adventures. The game begins with character generation. You will have to create it, change its appearance using an advanced editor, and then decide on the basic skills. After this, you can begin to explore the world around you.

item.title: Sons of the Forest
item.description: Game Description Sons of The Forest is a first-person multiplayer horror game with survival elements. The game is a sequel to the acclaimed hit The Forest. As in the previous part, you need to explore a mysterious forest inhabited by bloodthirsty monsters. Survive by hiding from enemies and carefully study the surrounding areas. Arm yourself with powerful weapons to face numerous opponents. The story centers on a special forces soldier with a Fight Demons tattoo.

item.title: Last Epoch
item.description: Game Description Last Epoch is an action-adventure game with a deep leveling system in a dark style, gameplay repeating the legendary Diablo. The camera view is also taken from there, it is isometric for a better overview of the surrounding areas. The story campaign for one person (multiplayer is not provided) invites you to explore the rich world of Eterra, with various picturesque places and dark dungeons. It contains many different oddities, secrets, many demons and other fiends of hell.

item.title: Myth of Empires
item.description: Game Description The goal of Myth of Empires is to teach the user to fight for their own place in a huge world. The game is positioned as a multiplayer sandbox in which the user creates an Empire, forming troops that participate in massive battles and sieges of cities, and also builds their own fortresses for defense. The action takes place in the East during the era of antiquity, when many states constantly fought among themselves, which led to chaos, famine and destruction.

item.title: Pacific Drive
item.description: Game Description Pacific Drive is an atmospheric car survival adventure in the Olympic Exclusion Zone. Here you will not find the usual racing tracks, but there will be supernatural dangers waiting for you that will make you very tense. The only chance of salvation is your car, which will have to be strengthened and improved throughout the game. You will have to look for resources in abandoned laboratories, set up a base in the garage, research new spare parts and construct new stations.

item.title: Nightingale
item.description: Game Description Nightingale takes you on a dangerous journey through the fantastical kingdoms of the fairies. As a Realmwalker, you’ll explore, craft, build, and fight across a variety of environments, alone or with friends. This open world survival game takes you through a labyrinth of beautiful but treacherous kingdoms. Stranded after the destruction of a network of portals, you must reach Nightingale, the last human bastion. Open portals and travel through wild forests, treacherous swamps and shimmering deserts.

item.title: Blaz Blue Entropy Effect
item.description: Game Description BlazBlue Entropy Effect is a 2D adventure game set in the BlazBlue universe, but with a different genre and style than previous fighting games. It features roguelite elements such as procedurally generated maps, permadeath, and character customization. There is also a rich plot with several endings, depending on the choice of the gamer. In the game you can choose one of seven unique characters, each of which has its own abilities and character.

item.title: Smalland: Survive the Wilds
item.description: Game Description In Smalland: Survive the Wilds the player takes on the role of a hero who has been diminished under unexplained circumstances. The protagonist woke up in the forest, not knowing whether other people had the same fate. With a head full of questions, he begins a struggle whose goal is not only to find out the truth, but, above all, to survive in a new inhospitable world. The player watches what is happening from the first person.

item.title: Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor
item.description: Game Description Deep Rock Galactic: Survivor is not your average survival game, but a single-player, addictive auto-shooting game that is sure to keep you on your toes. As a lone dwarf, you’ll have to use every weapon in your arsenal to fight off waves of deadly aliens while earning riches and unlocking powerful upgrades. But don’t think this will be an easy task. You will have to face the harsh and unforgiving landscape of the planet Hoxes, and only your wits and weapons can protect you.

item.title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League
item.description: Game Description Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League is perfect for all fans of the DC universe who want to look at familiar heroes from a new angle. Now the roles have been changed, superheroes have become a danger to the local population, and a villainous squad led by the crazy Harley Quinn will have to save her. Loud explosions, massive destruction and mild madness reign in the city of Metropolis.

item.title: Granblue Fantasy: Relink
item.description: Game Description Granblue Fantasy: Relink - an adventure in the vastness of the Heavenly Kingdom, where islands soar among the vast azure expanses. As the captain of a skyship, you’ll embark on a journey full of mystery, magic and camaraderie. Together with your faithful companions, such as the energetic dragon Virn and the mysterious Lyria, you will go to Estalucia - a mythical island shrouded in legends. You have to assemble a team of four people, which will include a variety of sky wanderers who own unique weapons and fighting styles.

item.title: Tekken 8
item.description: Game Description Tekken 8 is a continuation of the cult fighting game, directly continuing the story of the previous part. In the sequel, many beloved heroes return, and new fighters are introduced. A full-fledged story campaign is presented, telling the dramatic story of Jin Kazama’s family. In addition, you will find many different modes, including multiplayer battles, various tests, local co-op, the ability to customize fighters, etc. The gameplay of Tekken 8 is based on a complex combat system based on memorizing combinations and timings of opponents.

item.title: Anomaly Agent
item.description: Game Description Anomaly Agent is a fast-paced 2D action platformer that places players in the heart of a bustling cyberpunk metropolis. As the titular character, Anomaly, players take on the role of an agent on a mission to investigate and eliminate temporary anomalies wreaking havoc on the city. The narrative unfolds gradually, revealing a complex web of interconnected areas with their own unique challenges and mysteries. At the core of Anomaly Agent’s appeal is its innovative combat system, which relies on Anomaly’s unique ability to manipulate time.

item.title: Enshrouded
item.description: Game Description Enshrouded is an exciting game set in the kingdom of Embervale, taking players on an exciting journey through a land once devastated by a devastating magical plague. The user will have to explore the remnants of the lost kingdom, fight mutated creatures and unravel the mysterious secrets of the ancient Flame. One of the distinctive features of the project is the emphasis on the independence of the hero.

item.title: Palworld
item.description: Game Description Palworld offers you to find and use friends as helpers in a huge and dangerous world. The multiplayer survival game has elements of crafting, and the creatures themselves, discovered by the user in the process, become his pet friends, which help him at all stages of the passage, including the ability to move on them, construct buildings, engage in farming, production, and explore dungeons. The user finds himself in a virtual universe inhabited by bizarre animal creatures, which in this world are simply called Friends.

item.title: Ready or Not
item.description: Game Description Ready or Not is a tactical shooter that positions itself as a special forces simulator. The project is designed for fans of SWAT 4. The creators tried to focus on realism and cruelty. The game has single player, co-op and PvP. The main gameplay consists of conducting a special operation within the campaign or individual missions. Before you begin, you need to listen to the briefing, study the map of the building, decide on points for the assault and select equipment.

item.title: SANABI
item.description: Game Description SANABI is a pixel action game with retro style and unique locations. The game takes place in the distant future, where cybernetic prosthetics have become the norm, even if the person has not lost a limb. After all, they can be equipped with various useful technical devices and overcome human abilities. But it has also become a convenient opportunity for criminals to gain easy access to sophisticated weapons.

item.title: Magicraft
item.description: Game Description Magicraft throws you into a world overrun by ancient gods. As a lone hero, you wield a legendary staff - your only hope for salvation. This roguelike focuses on spells that can be combined to create devastating effects. The developers themselves admit that the number of possibilities exceeds their own imagination! The game world is strange and whimsical, filled with unusual creatures and riddled with a ridiculous plot. Magicraft doesn’t take itself too seriously, but rather offers a light-hearted adventure with an emphasis on fun and flashy combat.

item.title: Lethal Company
item.description: Game Description Lethal Company is a thrilling co-op horror game that plunges into the eerie depths of abandoned moons in a relentless pursuit of salvageable scrap metal. In the black reaches of space, players will find a menagerie of celestial bodies, alien life forms, and irreplaceable tools to find and use. The unique approach to gameplay ensures endless replayability, offering a variety of dangers and rewards depending on the chosen lunar expedition.

item.title: EA SPORTS FC 24
item.description: Game Description EA SPORTS FC 24 is designed to revolutionize virtual football. With an impressive roster of over 19,000 licensed athletes, over 30 leagues, and recreations of over 100 iconic stadiums, it’s a fan’s dream. At the heart of FIFA 24 is HyperMotion V, a revolutionary technology that uses volumetric data collected from cameras strategically placed around stadiums during more than 180 top-tier matches. Thanks to this technology, an unreal level of realism is achieved.

item.title: Rus against lizards
item.description: Game Description Rus vs. Lizards is a game in which users go on a journey to Ancient Rus' - a world plagued by an invasion of lizards and unholy creatures. In this epic adventure, you take on the role of a blessed hero, charged with the sacred duty of protecting the holy places of the Ancestors from the green plague. In the game you will find intense battles with hordes of lizards and other evil spirits, in which you will be able to show your heroic strength in the name of the Ancestors.

item.title: Starfield
item.description: Game Description Starfield opens a new chapter in the gaming universe after a quarter-century hiatus. Bethesda, known for such outstanding projects as The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and Fallout 4, offers an expansive next-generation role-playing game set in outer space. In 2330, humanity expands far beyond the boundaries of our solar system: pioneers colonize distant planets, turning into a space-faring civilization. Join the ranks of Constellation, a group of intrepid space explorers on a quest to find elusive artifacts scattered across the galaxy in Bethesda’s most ambitious endeavor to date.

item.title: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk
item.description: Game Description Bomb Rush Cyberfunk is a dynamic 3D platformer that invites you to explore the world of the near future. Cyberfunk has a huge number of techniques, including high speed movement, parkour, dancing, tags, stunts and much more. This is funkstyle! Find your unique handwriting and font. Fight against law enforcement officers and claim your rights to compete in a huge dystopian metropolis. The game is distinguished by a cartoon style, made to look like a comic book.

item.title: Tale of Immortal
item.description: Game Description Tale of Immortal, an open-world sandbox deeply rooted in Chinese mythology and cultivation, invites players into an immersive experience where the path to immortality is paved through strategic choices and the conquest of mythical monsters from the Classic of Mountains and Seasons. Your journey as a novice Qi Refinement Stage cultivator begins in Yukong Village. A world filled with unpredictable monsters, mystical kingdoms and treasures waiting in the wings will open before you.

item.title: Keeper's Toll
item.description: Game Description Keeper’s Toll is a fun and challenging game that will test the skills of any gamer who enjoys the classic retro time survival genre. Featuring unique dark fantasy elements, the game boasts a carefully crafted blend of skill-based gameplay, roguelike elements, and unique mechanics that set it apart from others in the genre. Gamers will be able to choose from six different heroes, each with their own defining mechanics, abilities, and meta progression.

item.title: Crab Champions
item.description: Game Description Crab Champions is one of those projects where the gamer is given control of an extraordinary hero. As you can guess from the name, the characters of the game are crabs. The setting is tropical islands - the player will be surrounded by palm trees, sand, ocean, stones and exotic animals. And also other crabs, armed to the teeth. Crab Champions can be played in three different modes: Co-op.

item.title: Resident Evil 4 Remake
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 4 Remake is a full-fledged remake of the cult fourth part, which is rightfully considered one of the best in the series. The developers took into account the criticism of fans after the release of the remake of the third game and did not stray far from their roots, adhering to the course taken with Resident Evil 2. The plot has not undergone drastic changes, however, some storylines have been added that were not in the original, the arcs of minor characters have expanded and, Of course, the controls have been improved and the graphics have been significantly updated.

item.title: The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker
item.description: Game Description The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker is an immersive, atmospheric role-playing adventure that takes you into the fictional world of Imbertal. The game focuses on classic old-school mechanics, allowing you to venture into a dark and dangerous dark fantasy setting. The main character is a cursed lord named Rothar Aekrest, who must deal with problems on his land, facing various obstacles and participating in difficult combat encounters with monsters. When going to The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker, you have to complete a large number of tasks and gain experience that allows you to upgrade and improve your character’s characteristics or add new skills and abilities.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy
item.description: Game Description Hogwarts Legacy is a role-playing game based on the famous books about the boy wizard “Harry Potter”. The events of Hogwarts: Legacy take place long before the birth of the main character of the books and films. The story dates back to the 19th century, specifically in the 1800s. The game takes place in the same universe and in the same school, so fans of the original saga will find many references and meet some familiar characters.

item.title: Pizza Tower
item.description: Game Description Pizza Tower stands out with its pixel graphics and animation. The art imitates old cartoon series from the end of the last century. The project also boasts an energetic soundtrack. It is a 2D side-scrolling platformer. This title is the spiritual successor to the video games from the Wario Land series. In it you can walk left and right, run, accelerate, jump, make dashes, break some obstacles, ride mounts, and turn into monsters.

item.title: Hi-Fi RUSH
item.description: Game Description Hi-Fi RUSH tells the story of the adventures of a guy named Chai. This music lover without one arm decided to take part in the Armstrong project. Vandeley Technologies provides implants to people with physical disabilities, but in return requires them to work for themselves. The hero was supposed to become a scavenger after receiving a mechanical prosthesis. However, during the operation, a music player is accidentally implanted into his chest and gives him new powers.

item.title: Lil Gator Game
item.description: Game Description Lil Gator Game from the first minutes creates a positive atmosphere and invites you to completely immerse yourself in this friendly world. Here, users take on the role of a little crocodile who wants to make new friends. But they need help, so the character will have to get down to business, completing their quests and instructions. And given that the main location in the game is a national park, you will have to spend a lot of time exploring individual areas and finding solutions.

item.title: HELLSEED
item.description: Game Description The gloomy atmosphere in HELLSEED is filled with riddles and secrets that the protagonist must cope with. The main character finds himself in Italy in 1980, in the small province of Turin. Users will take on the role of a private investigator who is investigating a strange case. Doctors from a psychiatric hospital are worried about a missing employee who was last at home. Players will explore the estate of the missing doctor, starting from the rooms of his desolate apartment, studying objects and analyzing the situation.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is a co-op first-person shooter. Events take place in the huge city of Tertium on the planet Atom Prime. The cult of insane heretics Admonition is trying to capture him. Four heroes, together with the forces of the Inquisition, must resist Chaos and stop the bloodthirsty horde of the living dead and save the inhabitants from extermination. Since this is a classic co-op shooter, the gameplay is primarily focused on shooting and killing demonic enemies using melee weapons.

item.title: ZERO Sievert
item.description: Game Description Plunging into ZERO Sievert, you will have to go on dangerous journeys through the post-apocalyptic expanses of a dying world, taking you to the terrain of a desolate alternative race. Taking control of one of the characters, you have to go on dangerous adventures, delving into creepy and gloomy places filled with strange phenomena and creatures that live beyond the limits of human vision. Adventures in ZERO Sievert immerse you in an atmosphere of loneliness and independent survival in wild conditions, full of unexplored places and unexplored locations through which the protagonist will have to wander and look for useful items for life support.

item.title: SIGNALIS
item.description: Game Description The space horror film SIGNALIS is made in the style of anime. The indie project is a representative of the old-school survival horror genre. We play as a girl named Elster. She wakes up in a pressure chamber on a ship where something terrible happened. The main character is a Replica - a kind of android analogue. She periodically sees visions of others and picks up strange radio signals.

item.title: Mount and Blade 2: Bannerlord
item.description: Game Description Mount and Blade 2 Bannerlord is a role-playing game with elements of medieval wars, the action of which takes place 200 years before the start of Part 1. In this sequel you will find an improved combat system and an enlarged game world - Calradia. Fight with hundreds of troops under your command and take direct part in the battles as one of the soldiers. You can storm enemy fortresses and destroy fortifications with siege weapons in Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord.

item.title: Vampire Survivors
item.description: Game Description Survival in the Vampire Survivors universe is based on minimalist gameplay, where you have to move around the map and knock out as much gold as possible. The main task for the protagonist is to advance through the levels generated in roguelight style. You need to try to survive the night, fighting off monsters and higher undead. Vampires will hunt for the protagonist, not giving him the opportunity to rest at a rest or come up with a future plan of action.

item.title: CULTIC
item.description: Game Description Death in CULTIC is the beginning of a mysterious path, so you shouldn’t be afraid of it. The player will have to muster up the courage to fight through hordes of perverted cultists in order to gain the upper hand in this battle. As the character progresses, he encounters hundreds of NPCs with completely frozen minds, who are guided by blind faith in their ideals. The cultists are further corrupted by an immortal and invisible entity that seeks sole domination of the world.

item.title: Escape the Backrooms
item.description: Game Description Atmospheric horror Escape the Backrooms offers cooperative gameplay for up to 4 gamers. A group of people find themselves in a huge and very strange room, from where it is not so easy to find a way out. Users are required to actively interact with each other via voice chat to coordinate actions. It is very important not to separate - you need to move in such a way that users can see each other.

item.title: Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered
item.description: Game Description Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered is an open-world action-adventure game set in New York City. Supervillains break free in the form of characters such as Mister Negative, Rhino, Scorpio, Vulture and Electro. But before he can track them down, Peter Parker contacts William Fisk. After he arrests a businessman, a gang war breaks out. Now only Spider-Man can stop the crime raging in the city. Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered includes an extensive expansion for The City That Never Sleeps.

item.title: Cult of the Lamb
item.description: Game Description In Cult of the Lamb, finding himself in the lands belonging to the false prophets, the gamer is invited to found his own cult, creating a powerful community of admirers. In an adventure game with roguelike elements, the player needs to spread his word to the forest dwellers, gradually making various forays into countries and regions in order to try to expand the sphere of influence of his religion, making it cover all regions.

item.title: Teardown
item.description: Game Description Teardown is a robbery simulator in a variety of conditions prepared by indie developers from Tuxedo Labs. Stylistically, the project was made using a voxel graphic component. This solution made it possible to implement complete destructibility of all available objects in the location. This freedom opens up the possibility of performing operations in a variety of ways, improvising on the fly. The gamer will have at his disposal explosives and a sledgehammer for destroying all kinds of surfaces to penetrate the territory, as well as several types of vehicles of different sizes for loading valuables and other things that need to be stolen according to the terms of a particular task.

item.title: Elden Ring
item.description: Game Description Elden Ring is an open world role-playing game from the creators of Dark Souls and Bloodborne, in collaboration with writer George R.R. Martin. The gameplay is a third-person action RPG where you explore the expanses of a fantasy world, equip yourself with a variety of weapons and fight powerful enemies. In the game, even one enemy poses a serious threat. Battles are based on timing and parries. Carefully study the monsters' patterns to effectively counterattack their attacks.

item.title: Total War: WARHAMMER 3
item.description: Game Description Gameplay Total War: WARHAMMER 3 is a mixture of turn-based strategy and RTS. It is necessary to gather an army and move it around the global map, capturing all areas. By extracting resources and recruiting units, you will need to create settlements. You can enter into diplomacy with different factions, enter into alliances with them, or declare war. The economic part of Total War: Warhammer 3 is presented by TBS mechanics, while battles take place in real time.

item.title: Dying Light 2: Stay Human
item.description: Game Description Dying Light 2: Stay Human starts 15 years after humanity became infected with a terrible virus. Many have turned into zombies who scour in search of living flesh, and the few survivors wage a daily struggle for existence. People are divided into several warring factions, which during the day make forays from shelters to find resources, and at night they hide from bloodthirsty monsters. The world has returned to its primitive state, where everyone fights only for their own lives.

item.title: God of War (2022)
item.description: Game Description God of War 2022 is an action-adventure game with a third-person view. This project is both a sequel to the previous part and a restart of the entire universe of the famous, cult slasher about the adventures of Kratos – a Spartan warrior, the protagonist of all 8 games in the “God of War” series, fighting against various gods and mythical creatures in a fit of rage and revenge.

item.title: Monster Hunter Rise
item.description: Game Description Monster Hunter Rise is a role-playing adventure set in the fictional village of Kamura. The territory is presented in the form of a vast mountainous area with studied hunting equipment and the original culture of the inhabitants. Players will play the role of hunters, and before starting the game they will have to choose one of several types of weapons, armor or special abilities. The world is filled with ancient ruins, shrines, dungeons and other locations.

item.title: Battlefield 2042
item.description: Game Description Battlefield 2042 is a tactical action game, the main conflict of which is the confrontation between Russia and the United States in the world of the near future. Humanity has exhausted almost all of the Earth’s resources. Now the mighty superpowers have entered the race for the planet’s last fossils. Germany lost ground and the EU collapsed. The world is in the midst of a Second Great Depression. The gameplay is a first-person shooter.

item.title: Gunfire Reborn
item.description: Game Description The shooter Gunfire Reborn contains elements of a roguelike and role-playing game. The player can choose to control several heroes with individual abilities. The game has a huge amount of randomness, from procedurally generated locations to dropped guns and loot. Gunfire Reborn is designed for both one and a company of up to 4 people. The game features 100 different types of items. Various mechanics will encourage you to study each fighter presented, who are more or less suitable for a specific situation and location.

item.title: Forza Horizon 5
item.description: Game Description Forza Horizon 5 is a racing game that focuses on multiplayer racing and free-roaming in an open world. This project includes many aspects from Forza’s previous games. More than 200 original cars from real-life companies are presented, with realistic driving and clutch physics. There are high-quality graphics, effects and other elements that completely immerse users in a believable environment. While riding around the world, the player is able to collide with other gamers or ordinary cars controlled by artificial intelligence.

item.title: MADNESS: Project Nexus
item.description: Game Description MADNESS: Project Nexus is a three-dimensional dynamic shooter with a side view, as well as a huge number of opponents and violence that happens on the monitor screen. The arcade controls are easy to remember, allowing you to quickly start enjoying the gameplay. This project from indie developers is a driving mixture of beat’em’up and slasher using not only melee weapons, but also firearms with different damage. The main feature of the gameplay is the ability to play cooperatively on one personal computer.

item.title: Webbed
item.description: Game Description The story of Webbed revolves around a happy little spider who tries to save her boyfriend from a huge and annoying bird. Take control of the spider and overcome difficult obstacles until you reach the main character’s beloved. Navigate through dangerous locations where predators live or difficult deadly objects are located. Explore the dangerous desert using your character’s abilities and your wits. Visit the tropics, slums and dungeons, where you will encounter original obstacles and enemies.

item.title: Subnautica: Below Zero
item.description: Game Description A game about the underwater world, which became a continuation of the original game, completely borrowing the engine. The world of Subnautica: Below Zero is inhabited not by simple creatures similar to those in the previous part, but by aliens who are more interesting to fight, and their world is much more beautiful than our reality. Adventures will be with you at every step, but do not forget that the world of the game was recognized as a real horror setting, where it is light and bright only in the first hundreds of meters of immersion in depth.

item.title: Resident Evil Village
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil Village continues the adventures of Ethan from the Seven. The Roman numeral hidden in the title on the posters hints that this is not a spin-off, but the eighth part of the series. This is already the tenth project in the main line. Winters was able to escape from the cannibal mansion and save his wife Mia. They got away from the American outback and decided to live an ordinary life.

item.title: Totally Accurate Battle Simulator
item.description: Game Description Totally Accurate Battle Simulator is a crazy tactical war game, heavily tied to physics. The battles take place in real time using weapons from different eras. The game is built on the laws of physics, so you can witness the most incredible combat in the history of video games! One of the main features of the game is its caricature and the creation of the most insane atmosphere of battles.

item.title: It Takes Two
item.description: Game Description The co-op adventure It Takes Two follows two central characters: Cody and May. They decided to get a divorce, which is why they found themselves in a surreal environment, turning into dolls. Now they have to go through hundreds of obstacles and dangers while exploring a new environment. A story about the eternal problems of relationships and how the main characters will reunite after overcoming a ton of obstacles on their own path.

item.title: Forza Horizon 4
item.description: Game Description Forza Horizon 4 is a realistic racing simulator with an open game world, where the player is given the opportunity to explore many cities, participate in various races and interact with other players. Drive along the tracks of Great Britain, unlock new cars, and take part in tournaments and races. The gameplay is focused on interaction between players. To participate in certain races, you will need to find a suitable area, as well as gather all participants in one lobby.

item.title: Rhythm Doctor
item.description: Game Description Rhythm Doctor is an indie game in which you need to treat patients to the rhythm of music. The music in the game has healing properties. Each patient has unusual problems based on music theory: polyrhythms, hemiols, atonality, syncopation, etc. Rhythm Doctor helps you learn music theory through gameplay. The game contains: more than 20 levels with their own stories; each chapter is a rhythmic concept; many doctors and unique patients; single and cooperative mode; about 50 different visual effects and backgrounds.

item.title: Valheim
item.description: Game Description Valheim is an open world survival game where you build your own base and fight mythical creatures from Scandinavian folklore. The game takes place in Valheim, the tenth Viking world. The hero’s goal is to reach the gates of Valhalla. By killing various monsters and monsters, you earn the blessing of the gods. The hero will visit various corners of the world: dense forests, snow-capped mountains and much more.

item.title: Cyberpunk 2077
item.description: Game Description Cyberpunk 2077 is an action role-playing game, the events of which unfold in the futuristic city of Night City, located on the West Coast of the United States. You will play as a protagonist named V (or V). The sex, gender and appearance of the hero must be set independently. Depending on the choice of class, the character’s background differs. There are three of them: Nomad, Child of the Street and Corporate.

item.title: Squad
item.description: Game Description Squad is a military tactical first person shooter game. This is a multiplayer game with an emphasis on realism. An important role is assigned to team interaction between users. This project does not have a story campaign or single player modes. Instead, players in it capture points, destroy weapons depots, or hold the defense. The title was originally called Project Reality. This was a modification for the second “Battle”.

item.title: Phasmophobia
item.description: Game Description Phasmophobia is a cooperative horror game designed for four players. The plot is built around paranormal phenomena, where a group of researchers is trying to prove with the help of special equipment that spirits and ghosts exist. You have to collect as much evidence as possible to find out what type of evil entity you are dealing with. Having studied the strengths and weaknesses of otherworldly forces, begin to expel demons.

item.title: Hades
item.description: Game Description In the roguelike Hades you will constantly engage in epic battles. Upgrade new abilities by fighting enemies. Gifts can be acquired by meeting the gods of Olympus, who will be happy to give you a piece of their power. Complete the instructions of Zeus, Athena, or simply get to know them to master new skills or equipment. Every time you meet a new character, you will witness some interesting event.

item.title: ULTRAKILL
item.description: Game Description ULTRAKILL is a game inspired by classic and modern shooters. You will find yourself in a future where people have become extinct. Now the main thing on the planet has become machines whose fuel is blood. There was little valuable liquid left on the surface of the Earth, and so robots began to explore the underground world in search of living creatures. Game Features: Fight multiple enemies. Destroy the risen dead, demonic creatures and other profit seekers.

item.title: Risk of Rain 2
item.description: Game Description Risk of Rain 2 is a continuation of the classic online game, which has become better and more complex than the original. The player will challenge the cruel world alone or team up with friends to defeat hordes of monsters, collect the necessary relics and escape from the terrifying planet. With each new attempt, you will be able to better understand the behavior of your opponents and defeat them outright with your skills, even when they are outnumbered.

item.title: Horizon Zero Dawn Complete Edition
item.description: Game Description Horizon Zero Dawn is an action game in the world of a post-apocalyptic future, in which the world is inhabited by robotic dinosaurs that destroyed modern civilization. The few surviving people formed into small primitive tribes and resist mechanical monsters using primitive weapons combined with high technology. The main character of Horizon Zero Dawn is a girl named Aloy. She was raised by a man named Rast, who is an Outcast.

item.title: The Henry Stickmin Collection
item.description: Game Description The Henry Stickmin Collection - a collection of games about the adventures of Henry Stickmin. This is a series of humorous adventure games that give you freedom of choice. The Henry Stickmin Collection is an updated classic, represented by 6 different games in the series. Both canon endings are included, as well as completely new end credits. Choice is at the core of The Henry Stickmin Collection’s gameplay. At each stage of the adventure you make a choice.

item.title: There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension
item.description: Game Description There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is a humorous adventure game where you have to click on every element available in the locations. You are taken on an amazing adventure through different video game universes. The visual style of the game is made in a 2D pixel style. Each of the numerous characters in There Is No Game: Wrong Dimension is voiced and played by professional actors. On your way there are many puzzles that need to be solved in an unconventional way.

item.title: Deep Rock Galactic
item.description: Game Description Deep Rock Galactic is a co-op shooter with fast-paced gameplay in which you will fight with other users against alien monsters. The game is made in a sci-fi style and has procedurally generated levels in which you will fight. The mission can be completed by 1 to 4 players. Act as one. Dig, explore the area and shoot with enemies waiting for you in huge numbers around every corner.

item.title: Resident Evil 3 Remake
item.description: Game Description [s][/s] Resident Evil 3: Remake is positioned as a remake of the original Resident Evil 3: Nemesis, released back in 1999. The time gap between the reissue and the original is 20 years. During this time, Capcom managed to radically rethink the series and enrich it with various innovations both in plot and gameplay, since progress does not stand still. If Resident Evil 2 in 2019 offered the player a slower and more intense gameplay, steeped in horror, then the new product in 2020 looks a little different.

item.title: GTA 4
item.description: Game Description GTA 4 became a revolutionary, breakthrough game in the series of criminal action games with a conditionally open world and almost complete freedom of action. It is not only technically and plot-wise different from its predecessors, but also sets a new standard of quality for all representatives of this and other genres. It is worth noting that the concept of GTA has gone far beyond the scope of this franchise, and some mechanics from this series of games are used in projects from other studios.

item.title: Half-Life: Alyx
item.description: Game Description Half-Life: Alyx became the first AAA quality game in history for virtual reality devices, the passage of which can be enjoyed on a PC only with the help of an appropriate device, namely a VR headset from Steam and related gadgets. The plot is a spin-off, the events of which unfold in the interval between the actions of the first and second parts. The Black Mesa Incident allowed Alliance forces to gain a foothold on the planet, leaving the remaining humans trapped in the cities.

item.title: DOOM Eternal
item.description: Game Description DOOM Eternal, a first-person shooter, continues the campaign of DOOM (developed in 2016). Our hero is the Doom Slayer. He will kill mutants and monsters on the territory of Mars, the attached spaceship, its satellites and Earth. In many ways, the plot scenes are taken from the second part of the series. The main addition to the game was moving through the levels. If earlier we could move to the next level only after finishing it, then in the new part it will be possible to “climb” to another location where the events of the next level take place.

item.title: Borderlands 3
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 3 is a continuation of the acclaimed series of shooters, containing tons of loot. The player will take on the role of one of the Vault Hunters and set off to explore the expanses of Pandora. All heroes have their own tree of characteristics, unique abilities and character. The gameplay allows you to go through the adventure solo or enlist the help of friends. The protagonist of Borderlands 3 learned to climb ledges and make tackles.

item.title: Ori and the Will of the Wisps
item.description: Game Description Ori and the Will of the Wisps is an adventure platformer with stunning hand-drawn graphics. You will find yourself in distorted lands that you must save from evil and overcome all the obstacles prepared by fate for the main character. You will take control of the little spirit Ori, who knows a lot about the obstacles and pitfalls of this world. Your owl friend Ku is in trouble after another flight.

item.title: Black Mesa
item.description: Game Description Black Mesa is a remake of the cult shooter Half-Life, which at one time turned out to be a breakthrough in the world of video games and made the name of Valve. They worked on this project for eight whole years, during which the creators tried to transfer the old game to the new Source engine with varying success. As a result, they managed to achieve the desired effect and in May 2015 the game was released.

item.title: Senren＊Banka
item.description: Game Description Senren＊Banka is primarily aimed at anime fans. The project uses the appropriate style (including chibi art) and Japanese voice acting. The plot combines romantic, tragic, mystical and humorous elements. The story revolves around supernatural incidents. A group of young people are trying to hide them from ordinary people. The premise in Senren＊Banka: A Thousand Colors of Love is as follows. A guy named Arichi Masaomi comes to the provincial town of Hoori in the summer.

item.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
item.description: Game Description Red Dead Redemption 2 is a third-person shooter adventure game set in the Wild West in 1899. The action involves the Dutch Van Der Linde gang, which is being pursued by lawmen after a botched ferry robbery. The player will take control of Arthur Morgan, one of the gang members. Some time after the unsuccessful prank, the gang decides that it is time to retire and live the rest of their lives like ordinary people, not bandits.

item.title: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
item.description: Game Description Halo: The Master Chief Collection is a complete collection of the cult shooter series about the Master Chief. The collection includes all numbered games in the series that were released before Halo: Infinite. At the same time, the developers have improved the visual component of the game, providing 4k resolution and HDR support for modern monitors. The story tells of the confrontation between the United Nations Space Command and the religious alien alliance Covenant.

item.title: Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order
item.description: Game Description In the epic game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order you will find amazing adventures, new challenges, modern graphics and high-quality laser sword battles! Immerse yourself in this saga of the Jedi and intergalactic war, in which you will play one of the key roles. The story takes place after Episode III, 5 years after the ominous Order 66. You will take on the role of a young Jedi Padawan who barely managed to escape from a trap created by the Sith.

item.title: Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2: Definitive Edition is a re-release of the classic real-time strategy game released in 1999 under the name “The Age of Kings”. The game is famous for the fact that the player develops his civilization from the Stone Age to the Modern Age. The gameplay is based on the fact that it is necessary to hire peasants, gather troops, erect buildings, study maps, develop the era and explore new capabilities, technologies and, most importantly, destroy the enemy.

item.title: NFS Heat
item.description: Game Description Need for Speed: Heat is an arcade racing simulator with an open game world and a large selection of cars of a wide variety of brands. The plot takes place in Palm City, a fictional city very similar to sunny Miami. You will be able to ride around the city, along the coast, and also take part in stunning races. The story begins with police captain Mercer catching one of the participants in night racing, which is prohibited by law.

item.title: People Playground
item.description: Game Description People Playground is an indie game, a kind of murder simulator in different ways. Here you can simply drag mannequins of creatures across the screen and throw them from a height, or create dangerous situations with your own hands - accidents, torture chambers, obstacle courses. There are 5 types of creatures available for destruction: a fragile person, a heavier and stronger robot, a gorse (spider), a regular and improved turret.

item.title: Total War: THREE KINGDOMS
item.description: Game Description Total War: THREE KINGDOMS is the first game in the series that recreates epic conflicts in Ancient China. The game combines a turn-based campaign of empire building and conquest with epic real-time battles. 190 AD. A beautiful but fragmented country awaits a new emperor and a new life. The player will have to unify China, create the next great dynasty and leave a legacy that will endure for millennia.

item.title: Beat Saber
item.description: Game Description A musical game designed for the good taste of the player Beat Saber. The levels are a small interactive location where blocks of 2 colors fly towards the player. The player must cut these blocks. The difficulty of the game is that the number of blocks and the method of destruction are always different. For example, in some levels you will have to chop them with a sword of a certain color, in others you will have to hit them from the right side.

item.title: MORDHAU
item.description: Game Description MORDHAU is a hack and slash game. Fights take place online on the company’s servers; offline you can train your skills in fights against artificial intelligence. A training session is also available, in which you will learn the basic mechanics and get your initial gold capital. The name refers to a special German grip on the weapon, which, by the way, is available for selection. The main, but not the only feature is a fencing system that is as close to reality as possible, created through consultations with experts.

item.title: Mortal Kombat 11: Ultimate Edition
item.description: Game Description Despite the average ratings for the 10th part of the franchise, Mortal Kombat 11 became a continuation of the story, and the developers tried to improve and add a lot of new things to players. The eleventh fighting game in the Mortal Kombat universe has new gameplay, plot, graphics, and character relationships that reveal the story as it progresses. We arrive in the world after the defeat of Shinnok, who was defeated by Cassie Cage.

item.title: Katana ZERO
item.description: Game Description Katana ZERO is an extraordinary and dynamic platformer in the genre of science fiction and action, created in the best traditions of pixel graphics. The plot of the game tells us about a dystopian city, the main character lives in the third quarter, his name is Zero. He was severely wounded in the war, causing him to lose his memory. At night he has nightmares about past battles, and during the day he has to visit a psychotherapist.

item.title: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice
item.description: Game Description Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice is an incredibly challenging action game that makes feudal Japan look dark, burning, and beautiful at the same time. The third-person stealth action game combines the features of RPGs and the themes of Souls games. Well-designed graphics of feudal Japan allow us to plunge into the difficult process of returning our master of the Ashina clan. The leader of the opposition - Genichiro - kidnapped a samurai from Shinobi, and now we must cope with a huge number of his followers in order to save the teacher, master, master and good friend who paid us well in a past life.

item.title: Devil May Cry 5
item.description: Game Description Devil May Cry 5 is a new third-person slasher for fans of the series. Dante and Nero return to the game universe to defeat all the demons, but will they have a different task? Let’s take a closer look. The developers did not touch the game mechanics; they only significantly changed the speed of the battle. If shooters have a subgenre - FPS - then this slasher is an analogue.

item.title: Space Engineers
item.description: Game Description The gameplay of Space Engineers is that you will build space stations, ships, and begin to study neighboring planets and passing asteroids, where you will find many useful resources. Control is carried out from the perspective of a person, a ship, a base, a flying station, and you can change the camera view from both the third and first person. When you create a world, the game automatically generates a random sequence of planets on which you can find valuable resources.

item.title: Touhou Luna Nights
item.description: Game Description Touhou Luna Nights is a platformer that immerses you in the atmosphere of gothic mysticism. The main character is Sakuya Izaei, who works as a senior maid for the vampire Remilia Scarlet. The girl was calmly doing housework when the mistress deprived her of her powers and sent her to the “Magical Space.” Sakuya is looking for her way home and is eager to find out what her treacherous boss is up to.

item.title: Metro Exodus: Gold Edition
item.description: Game Description The events of Metro Exodus - a first-person shooter with elements of stealth and horror - take place in the same areas as the previous parts. The Russian Federation and the Republic of Kazakhstan are still waging a fierce war for life inside, in underground territories, with representatives of hostile clans, factions and monsters who devour, rather than kill, their prey. Artyom leaves the Order after the battle for D6.

item.title: Resident Evil 2 Remake
item.description: Game Description RESIDENT EVIL 2 / BIOHAZARD RE:2 - a complete rework, allowing players to enjoy modern graphics, a new engine, enemies, weapons and a much more advanced game story. Follow the story of police officer Leon S. Kennedy and student Claire Redfield. Due to an unknown outbreak of a virus, the entire city of Raccoon City was enveloped in monsters, people began to turn into strange creatures, and then kill the survivors.

item.title: Bloons TD 6
item.description: Game Description Bloons TD 6 (Bloons Tower Defense 6) is a 2018 action strategy game where the player will have to defend a fortress with the help of monkeys. The goal of the game is to destroy a stream of fast-moving balloons. The fewer goals missed, the greater the chances of winning. The balls differ in appearance and characteristics - new ones have been added in this part: purple, reinforced and impenetrable.

item.title: DayZ
item.description: Game Description The multiplayer sandbox DayZ is a reworked version of the mod of the same name for Arma 2. The game is distinguished by its extremely realistic setting and hardcore survival in a post-apocalyptic environment. The game takes place in the fictional post-Soviet country of Chernarus. After the outbreak of an unknown virus, most of the population has turned into zombies, and the survivors are forced to fight for their lives and valuable resources.

item.title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
item.description: Game Description Insurgency: Sandstorm is a sequel to a multiplayer shooter built on deathmatches in confined spaces, with the ability to use light vehicles. The game has been significantly improved and expanded. The key to victory lies only through well-coordinated teamwork. The action takes place in the Middle East, on the ruins of settlements and military bases. You need to carefully choose your weapon and explore the territory, because without caution and tactics you can quickly catch a bullet in the forehead.

item.title: DUSK
item.description: Game Description DUSK is a canonical first-person shooter created in a retro style. The plot is quite simple and clear - there is a small town called DUSK, in its vicinity ruins were discovered that have mystical properties. Many scientists and soldiers came here, studying strange objects and everyone gradually went crazy. They became possessed, and the government surrounded the entire area with a wall. A brave hero was found who entered the forbidden territory in search of these unique artifacts, but was captured by occultists and hung on hooks.

item.title: Kenshi
item.description: Game Description Kenshi forces you to survive from the very first minutes of the game. An impressive RPG with an open world and the ability to create your own squad, the remaining player privileges are gradually revealed to us. For example, you can build your own buildings in any location, conquer them from other factions, create your own business, sell goods in peaceful settlements, craft whatever you want, explore the environment and do whatever you want.

item.title: Among Us
item.description: Game Description Among Us (Among As) is a multiplayer game designed for 4 to 10 people on the server at the same time for exciting gameplay with a variety of scenarios. The setting of the project is boundless outer space, in which maps with different structures of surrounding objects are located. Casual controls and the ability to play on a local network in cross-platform mode make it possible to invite a noisy group to spend time together on the Among Us project.

item.title: BATTLEFIELD 5
item.description: Game Description Battlefield 5 is a first-person shooter, the fifteenth game in the Battlefield series. Unlike previous games in the series, Battlefield 5 sacrifices historical accuracy for the sake of the player: weapon handling, for example, has been noticeably improved, making the game more like an arcade shooter. Most of the changes made to BFV are solid improvements over its predecessor. War Stories is a series of single-player missions introduced in Battlefield V, where the player is invited to become an eyewitness to tragic events.

item.title: Assassins Creed Odyssey
item.description: Game Description For the first time in the history of the series, you will be able to choose a character for whom you will administer justice and change history. Assassin’s Creed Odyssey is the first slasher RPG in the history of the developers, in which we do not play as an assassin, but choose a real warrior of Ancient Greece! We are offered two characters to choose from: Alexios or Kassandra.

item.title: SCUM
item.description: Game Description SCUM is another survival game set in a completely open world. The developers tried to make the gameplay and the story of the characters so absurd that the very fact of some actions causes disgust. The plot reveals to us a modern society that wants nothing more than to “watch the spectacle.” The well-known producer TEC1 organized a show with the name - Scam - where people are thrown out in an open location, forced to survive without everything, and after that they are gradually introduced to a series of difficulties: a zombie epidemic, robots, dangerous animals, or money with the promise that once they get out , players will be able to spend them to buy freedom in the new society.

item.title: MONSTER HUNTER: WORLD
item.description: Game Description The gameplay of MONSTER HUNTER: WORLD has been slightly reworked compared to the previous part. We don’t just kill monsters, make new equipment, but now weapons are divided into several classes, and, in fact, at the beginning of the game we are something like a “neutral character”. In the new ecosystem, hunters have emerged who will create incredibly difficult conditions for the existence of monsters. Dragons, flying dinosaurs (not like dragons), and other creatures inhabit this eco-system.

item.title: Dead Cells
item.description: Game Description A stunning rogue-like platformer with metroidvania elements - Dead Cells - features a real fight between the hero and constantly changing levels on the territory of the castle. Our hero is a creature who is trying to get out of the castle’s maze. He will try over and over again to cope with constantly generated opponents. But in random places on the map you will find many weapons with random characteristics.

item.title: Yakuza 0
item.description: Game Description As a dialogue-heavy role-playing game that explores a deep story, Yakuza 0 claims to be a game that combines friendship, self-love, and the search for true calling. The Yakuza is the largest mafia group in Japan, which controls everything that can be controlled. Events begin in 1988, when two Yakuza characters - Kazuma Kiryu and Goro Majima - take part in a battle for a small industrial plot in the center of Kamurocho.

item.title: DARK SOULS: REMASTERED
item.description: Game Description DARK SOULS: REMASTERED is an already iconic Japanese action/RPG released in 2011. The development was carried out by From Software. A remastered version was released in May 2018 at the instigation of QLOC. So, what are the acclaimed “Dark Souls”? Firstly, this is a high-quality action RPG, with a third-person view. At the very beginning, you will need to set a number of characteristics for your character: appearance and class.

item.title: Conan Exiles
item.description: Game Description Conan Exiles is an amazing multiplayer survival game with RPG and action elements. Employees of the Norwegian company Funcom worked on the project. The project was released at the end of spring 2018. Stunning graphics are a rare quality that developers of various MMORPG games pay attention to. But this time everything happened exactly the opposite. Funcom, 10 years before Conan Exiles, had already released a similar game called Age Of Conan.

item.title: The Forest
item.description: Game Description A survival simulator on an inhabited island - The Forest - was made in graphics that were new for that time, opening up completely ambiguous gameplay for the protagonist. We play as a character who finds himself on an inhabited island and now must survive under any conditions. Attacking cannibal natives, animals, lack of food, water and shelter - these are all just little things. A plane crashed not far from your island, and you are the only survivor in these conditions.

item.title: Far Cry 5
item.description: Game Description Finally, the plot of Far Cry 5 has reached America. Crazed fanatics unleashed their might on the state of Montana. A first-person shooter with action elements brings us to a reality in which even the movements of dogs will be more than real. The modernization of the shooter took several years, so the development studio warns us in advance that the game is based on religious motives. Age limit: 18+.

item.title: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
item.description: Game Description Warhammer: Vermintide 2 is a first-person slasher with abilities, magic, character upgrades, a variety of weapons and meat, combining a unique combat system of 5 different factions. The modernized first part is made on a new graphics engine, allowing us to see every severed limb; look at dead enemies and collect dropped loot around them, not paying attention to graphical inaccuracies. The plot of Warhammer: Vermintide 2 revolves around Helmgarth Castle, surrounded by a small settlement.

item.title: Kingdom Come: Deliverance
item.description: Game Description The plot of Kingdom Come: Deliverance takes place in a simple European village. We play as the son of a blacksmith. Our name is Henry. The civil war affected not only the political upheaval, but also ordinary villages and people like yours. Friends, family and your entire lineage have been slaughtered by brutal mercenaries in a sinister plot. We miraculously managed to survive, so we take the last sword forged by our father and march against the army of godless people!

item.title: Rust
item.description: Game Description Rust (Rust) An ideal first-person survival simulator is not a simple escape from a city or civilization, but a necessary measure based on the conditions of our player. In Rust we will have to kill people, animals, build houses, dwellings, try to make fire out of nothing and survive in a world where everything is trying to kill us. The gameplay begins with the fact that we find ourselves on an island.

item.title: Celeste
item.description: Game Description Madeline must climb Celeste . No one knows why she needs this, but the characters around her gradually reveal this secret to us. The game is a complex platformer that combines a storyline, pixel graphics, character leveling and aspects of human existence buried in dialogue scripts. The heroine will fight with ghosts in abandoned cities, with her demons while she walks into the wasteland; will explore the secret corners of his soul while learning a new location and ways to climb the mountain more painlessly.

item.title: Subnautica
item.description: Game Description In the world of Subnautica, your ship has crashed in an oceanic area, and there is only one straight line - down to the bottom. The landscapes around you are illuminated by the sun, the coral reefs shimmer beautifully under the sun as you slowly sink towards the endless darkness of space. Exploring a huge open world allows you not only to plunge under the water and look at the inhabitants of this ocean, but also to build your own underwater base there and build a research center on it.

item.title: CarX Drift Racing Online
item.description: Game Description Arcade car simulator CarX Drift Racing Online is a new word in the world of racing, where the main component is drifting! From the very beginning, you will have a huge number of opportunities that you can use in the world of real graphics and pumping up cars with modifications from famous manufacturers. From the first to the last minute in the game you will be able to upgrade your car so that it becomes a world prize-winner in the world of drifting!

item.title: Assassin's Creed Origins
item.description: Game Description The story of the third-person slasher is fully explored in Assassin’s Creed Origins. Only in this part we are told and described in detail how the brotherhood of Assassins was actually created, why the entire caste of killers hid for several hundred years, and how the principles of the brotherhood were formed. The plot begins with the fact that we kill one of the pharaohs who own an entire pyramid, hundreds of subjects and countless hired killers.

item.title: Middle-earth: Shadow of War - Definitive Edition
item.description: Game Description The action takes place in the fictional world of the writer Tolkien. The Middle Lands are full of adventures for our player, so the plot unfolds from half of them. Events introduce us to the continuation of the previous part. Talion and Celebrimbor forge a new ring, which Sauron does not know about - he will not be able to influence it. The new ring carries with it another responsibility: in Middle-earth: Shadow of War, Celebrimbor loses his freedom in exchange for a new One Ring.

item.title: A Hat in Time
item.description: Game Description In the 3D platformer A Hat in Time we will have to play as a girl who both looks and is called Hat Girl. She goes on an interplanetary journey to return home, but ends up in the city of the Mafia. At this location, a Mafioso gets into our ship and completely inspects the ship, but after checking, he scatters “time particles”, and then spreads them throughout the entire Mafia planet.

item.title: Cuphead
item.description: Game Description In Cuphead we choose one of two heroes and set off to conquer a world that looks like very old cartoons, with tons of weapons, special moves and immortality. A classic, in the truest sense of the word, platformer, in which everything is set in the world of the 1930s. The music is jazz accompaniment, the graphics are standard Disney of the time, and the bosses are neither good nor evil.

item.title: Stick Fight: The Game
item.description: Game Description Stick Fight: The Game is a multiplayer platformer with fighting game elements. Players control colorful people, overcoming obstacles and fighting each other. The main gameplay consists of moving, jumping and reacting quickly. On the path of the heroes there will be deadly obstacles that will take the lives of all those who hesitated even a little and did not react to the situation. Game features: from 2 to 4 players over a local or online network; physics-based combat system; about 100 well-developed and detailed locations; includes a level editor; various ranged and melee weapons; procedurally generated and contextual animations based on the system Totally Accurate Battle Simulator.

item.title: Total War: WARHAMMER 2
item.description: Game Description Total War: WARHAMMER 2 is a turn-based strategy that invites you to immerse yourself in the gloomy campaign of the New World. The gameplay is highlighted by large-scale battles between six races. Enter the battlefield to save or destroy the world. Total War Warhammer 2 consists of two parts: a turn-based campaign in the open world and tactical battles in real time. Play both in single mode and take part in multiplayer battles.

item.title: ARK: Survival Evolved
item.description: Game Description The world of ARK: Survival Evolved is a setting full of dangers, in which not only dinosaurs, but also other creatures will try to kill you. People become especially dangerous. The game does not have any interesting plot, but there is a huge open world in which you have to build your base, hunt with a group of people (your friends), attack, defend, make weapons and explore the area.

item.title: VTOL VR
item.description: Game Description VTOL VR is a military flight simulator with a first-person view and in the surroundings of the near future. The game requires a VR headset and a motion controller. The title allows you to freely rotate your head while sitting in the virtual cockpit. Modes include training, campaign and free flight. There are a lot of tasks here. In addition to other aircraft, ships, tanks, anti-aircraft and artillery installations act as opponents and allies.

item.title: Slime Rancher
item.description: Game Description A funny open-world first-person shooter - Slime Rancher is a mixture of genres in one complex picture, which the developers called - Boundless Outland. We plunge into a special experimental environment. Our hero’s name is Beatrix LeBeau, and he is a farmer. Armed with courage, madness and a funny vacuum cleaner, he decides to stay on the planet of the Boundless Outlands, because a certain Hobson Twillgers left us his farm.

item.title: The Long Dark
item.description: Game Description A game about survival in a world without electricity. The Long Dark is eternal darkness in locations, gorgeous graphics from developers who love the sky and stars as their second home. Players were pleased that the entire gameplay is divided into two modes. The first is a story-based passage of 5 episodes, the total duration of which is 60-70 hours, depending on how the plot is followed. The second mode is survival in an excellent open world, where you will have to keep an eye on the contents of your backpack, check for items, collect skins, fry meat, take refuge in shelters, furnish your own house or a small corner in a house for survivors, where the owner of this establishment will shelter you.

item.title: Ravenfield
item.description: Game Description The team-tactical shooter Ravenfield will allow you to plunge into furious battles, where you have everything - from tanks to fleets. There is a complete lack of storyline and even multiplayer. The latter fact is extremely unusual for projects of this genre. It would seem that it is interesting to play against bots and when there are no real users on the map. This omission at first glance is more than compensated for by a fairly developed artificial intelligence - opponents and allies behave extremely intelligently and together with them you can perform a variety of tactics using numerous commands and options.

item.title: Little Nightmares
item.description: Game Description Little Six is ​​a girl who was brought on board the ship as a servant. She, like many nomes - the characters of the game - hides her face for unknown reasons. In the game we have to get out from the lowest sector to the upper decks, but the levels will not immediately allow us to do this. First, the player needs to know that sinister hands will always hunt for us.

item.title: NieR: Automata
item.description: Game Description An open-world action-adventure game, NieR: Automata tells the story of androids 2B, 9S and A2 as they battle a dystopia created by powerful machines. All of humanity was evicted from their planet by mechanical creatures that arrived from another world. In an attempt to retake the Earth from aliens, people send combat robots to somehow resist the invaders. This must be the final attempt, the last hope to get your home back.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands
item.description: Game Description The open world of the new part - Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands - truly inspires what the developers tried to convict all players of. It must be said, but there is no plot in a third-person shooter. You independently write the story of your team, which is initially aimed at destroying the cartel that trades and produces drugs. But more on that later. First, it’s worth discussing the inner world of Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands.

item.title: Hollow Knight
item.description: Game Description The classic action-platformer gives us several hours of exciting travel into underground cities to creatures that have only guarded wealth for the last thousand years, being possessed by it. Our hero in Hollow Knight is one of those who believe in legends. He goes to the dungeons under Mudmouth to gain riches, fame, general respect and popularity among the knights who did not gather the strength to descend, but will it really be so?

item.title: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 7: Biohazard is a survival horror game that continues the famous series of games, one of the founders of the genre. The release is timed to coincide with the twentieth anniversary of the universe. An option is available to play using a virtual reality helmet and control of special complete controllers from VR glasses. The seventh part was a return to the roots of the first games in the series, because, unlike parts 5 and 6, which were focused on action, shooting and the plot taking place in different parts of the world, this project has the main location in the form of a small estate of the Baker family, which gives the atmosphere is claustrophobic and increases the degree of fear.

item.title: Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun
item.description: Game Description Shadow Tactics: Blades of the Shogun is a tactical stealth action game set in the Japanese Edo era (1603-1868). A conspiracy led by Kage-sama is carried out against the new shogun, after he was able to unite the lands of Japan. In order not to destroy the world, the ruler instructs his henchman samurai named Mugen to track down Kage-sama and his organization. For these purposes, the hero enlists the support of four companions - masters of secrecy and penetration.

item.title: Killing Floor 2
item.description: Game Description A cooperative first-person shooter in which there are only two modes - survival and battle in the territory. Killing Floor 2 does not have a plot, but there is sharp FPS on several maps, where each player chooses the desired role for himself - a zombie or a department fighting an epidemic. In addition to the fact that the gameplay differs on both sides of the barricades, players can buy additional weapons, make skins and show who can stand up best on the map.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim Special Edition
item.description: Game Description Skyrim has become one of the favorite games on two continents of our planet. The first/third person slasher captivated players not only with its open-world RPG content, but also with its graphics, sounds, characters, features, and, of course, dragons. Our character in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim Special Edition begins the same story, but you immediately notice that everything around him is completely different. If in the original version of the game we move along a snowy road, now the colors of the autumn forest prevail, maintaining the same atmosphere.

item.title: Titanfall 2
item.description: Game Description Titanfall 2 is a first-person shooter in a fantasy future setting. Continuation of the first game, released in 2014. In this part, in addition to online battles, there is a single-player campaign about Jack Cooper, a soldier who does not have his own titanium, but wants to get it. At the center of the story is the conflict between the militia, assembled from the common people, and the giant corporation IMC.

item.title: Battlefield 1
item.description: Game Description Battlefield 1 is a first-person shooter in the setting of the First World War. The game is the 15th in the series of the same name. The plot is divided into five chapters and begins with a prologue. The story takes place in 1918 and is told from the perspective of tankman Daniel Edwards, who controls the Black Bass tank. Before the war, he was an ordinary driver, but now he has to break through the German line.

item.title: No Man's Sky
item.description: Game Description Travel on an intergalactic level has become too simple and ordinary.
