It’s becoming increasingly difficult to create a game that captivates with its graphics, but the developers of No Man’s Sky, an indie adventure game with an open world and a wonderful RPG base, were able to recreate the image of space. Distant, limitless, completely open and so human. We play as a character, but then our gameplay switches to an entire space station or ship.

item.title: DOOM (2016)
item.description: Game Description DOOM 2016, unlike DOOM Ethernal, has less dynamics, but is more related to the horror genre. We can say that it began the evolution of the series towards speed and platforming, and it is considered closer in spirit to the series than its brother released in 2020. It was the first step towards a global rethinking of the franchise. The game takes place inside the corridors of a giant research complex.

item.title: Don't Starve Together
item.description: Game Description Don’t Starve Together is a survival simulator in an unknown world, where our character, pre-selected in the editor, wakes up and immediately goes to look for firewood, because Maxwell said so. The game is cooperative, since the story passage is divided into 2 parts. The first is survival. It is built on three phases of the day: day, evening and night. During the day, your character calmly survives, collects items, crafts new ones, eats and carries out orders for Maxwell.

item.title: DARK SOULS 3
item.description: Game Description The gameplay of DARK SOULS 3 provides all the same opportunities that were in the second part. For us, a third-person slasher with elements of stealth and survival remained at the same level in terms of combat, but the entire combat system was made more dynamic. So much so that sometimes we don’t have time to jump away to recharge our skill, and they already kill us. The real hassle and face of the game genre is difficulty at every turn.

item.title: Enter the Gungeon
item.description: Game Description In Enter the Gungeon you will remember such a genre as bullet hell or “hell of bullets”. The main characters explore the Gungeon and try to find a legendary artifact - a weapon that can kill the past. To do this, you need to fight your way through hordes of monsters and defeat formidable bosses. Loot, secrets, penny-pinching merchants and shopkeepers, new equipment and more loot - the recipe for a good game.

item.title: Hot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades
item.description: Game Description The game Hot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades can be called a full-fledged weapons simulator. You need to go to the training ground, which contains a huge selection of different firearms: pistols, machine guns, shotguns, rocket launchers, grenades, etc. You can use any available ammunition, training on targets and taking the highest positions on the leaderboard. Afterwards you can go and set off fireworks. Targets can be not only static within the walls of a gray pavilion, but also moving in open space.

item.title: Grim Dawn
item.description: Game Description The gloomy dawn in Grim Dawn showed that the fabric of the created universe was too weak, so Cairn accepted robbers, bandits, magicians and a bunch of all kinds of creatures and undead into its embrace. Dark times have come to the territory of Cairn. But after that, people did not give up trying to attack their enemies, and called aliens into the world. They opened portals for them and let in several individuals to receive ether.

item.title: Rise of the Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Our task in Rise of the Tomb Raider is to get ahead of your enemies, go on your first expedition and watch interactive videos, of which there are at least 1.5 hours of gameplay in the game. Lara Croft goes to the unknown world of the city of Kitezh. A secret organization called “Trinity” is also heading there. The principle of the game about Lara is an adventure game mixed with the adventure romance of the first journey, in which we kill with a bow, collect important items, and sometimes survive in the wild.

item.title: NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 4
item.description: Game Description Familiar to many fans of the Naruto series, NARUTO SHIPPUDEN: Ultimate Ninja STORM 4 transcends the fighting game genre, taking the game to the next level. In the final part, we will find out who will win in the confrontation between Naruto and Sasuke. We will learn a lot of details about the 4th Shinobi War, and also go over some aspects of the anime that were missed in previous parts.

item.title: XCOM 2
item.description: Game Description Twenty years ago, people signed an act of complete surrender of the earth to the aliens. Another civilization has shown that there is no hope for salvation, and therefore alien invaders have taken over the entire planet. At the beginning of XCOM 2 we are shown a video from the current ruler of the planet (in fact, this is a staged, drawn character, he is controlled by aliens), who says that today is the day when the aliens captured us, and the earth plunged into peace; Today we celebrate 20 years of freedom.

item.title: Scrap Mechanic
item.description: Game Description Scrap Mechanic is a multiplayer engineering sandbox that offers you to design various mechanisms and compete with friends. The game world revolves around a mechanic who maintains robots on an agricultural planet. He makes sure that they are working properly: that they are cultivating the land on time, sowing, collecting raw materials, which the hero then sends to the central planets, where people live ordinary lives. But one day the spaceship crashed, and the robots around went crazy.

item.title: The Isle
item.description: Game Description The island on which The Isle takes place has a rich and varied environment that is randomly generated. All artifacts, items and events will be located in different places with each new launch. Players must team up to effectively explore the area, which contains many secrets, including various quest items that further advance the plot. The map contains an area of ​​16x16 square kilometers. Multiplayer survival game The Isle allows you to play with three different factions in three different modes:

item.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
item.description: Game Description A new installment in the first-person shooter, Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege is a game of multiplayer destruction. We will not just destroy the map to which we and our friends were sent, but we will build traps, plant a bomb, and all this at a distance of a bow shot. The technical equipment of the new part is made specifically so that you can blow up everything in the open location of each level.

item.title: Just Cause 3
item.description: Game Description Just Cause 3 is a continuation of the famous franchise about the adventures of a specially trained agent named Rico Rodriguez. This part of the series did not deviate from the style and genre of previous games in the universe where the mercenary nicknamed “Scorpio” lives. The end of the trilogy is made with the same driving action, open world, a large number of tricks and devices available in the protagonist’s arsenal, and an adventure plot in which the fate of an entire state will be at stake.

item.title: Fallout 4
item.description: Game Description Fallout 4 is a sequel to the famous role-playing game series in a post-apocalyptic setting. The player wakes up from cryosleep and discovers that he is the only survivor of Vault 111. Having made it to the surface, he finds himself in the Wasteland - a world destroyed by nuclear war. The gameplay includes: a free open world with hundreds of locations to explore, a huge number of NPCs, companions and quests, as well as interaction with many factions, including the Institute, the Brotherhood of Steel, the Minutemen and agents of the Underground; S.

item.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 3
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter Call of Duty: Black Ops III demonstrates the blurred relationship between ordinary people and technology. In it you will forever forget that the new generation of soldiers is not a fiction, but a reality that will overtake us in the near future. Humanity has created technology to be leaders in the coming war, but will it be? The game shows this in three modes: story campaign, multiplayer shooter at scenario locations, and also in zombie mode.

item.title: Broforce
item.description: Game Description Broforce is a powerful paramilitary organization that is called upon when the world is in danger due to an excessive number of evil forces. Take control of dozens of different brothers to counter terrorist attacks and save civilians. Destroy your opponents with napalm, shooting, lightning and other various character skills. Broforce is a 2D shooter platformer with pixel graphics. You will move around locations, destroying opponents in every possible way.

item.title: Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain
item.description: Game Description Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain is a continuation of the famous series of stealth shooters from the recognized master of game design and production Hideo Kojima. The plot taking place in this game becomes a prequel to the very first game in the universe - Metal Gear. It forms a complete picture with the prologue released a little earlier - Metal Gear Solid V: Ground Zeroes.

item.title: BeamNG drive
item.description: Game Description BeamNG.drive is a car simulator that simulates the behavior of cars during collisions. Excellent physics, realistic controls and spectacular accidents are the main features of the game. The simulator allows you to find out what the consequences will be if, for example, the steering wheel of a Ferrari jams and the car flies into the oncoming lane, where it collides with a 40-ton truck. Or assess the damage to an army jeep whose brakes jammed when it was going down a hill at a speed of 90 km/h, flew off the road and crashed into a tree.

item.title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
item.description: Game Description The legendary third-person slasher series - The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, which tells us the story of Geralt of Rivia, who becomes one of the few characters in the central series of action-packed books. We start the game remembering the events of the second part. But let’s not talk about them. Our hero is a born killer, capable of killing and ending the lives of thieves, criminals, assassins, kings, leaders, generals and monsters living throughout the map.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 5
item.description: Game Description GTA 5 has received dozens of awards for its open world, and almost the most expensive multi-platform project in history is Grand Theft Auto V. The story opens before us in the same fictional state - San Andreas, made 1 to 1 as Southern California. We play as three robber friends who have spent their entire adult lives stealing cars, robbing small shops and people on the street. One day someone decides to get involved in organized crime, which they have been fighting for the last 5 years.

item.title: Dark Souls 2: Scholar of the First Sin
item.description: Game Description DARK SOULS 2: Scholar of the First Sin takes the dark atmosphere and addictive gameplay to a whole new level of quality. As before, you, in the role of a wandering soul, have to wander through a dark and mysterious world, use tactics during battle even with simple opponents, and always remain on guard, since danger comes from everywhere - these are the rules of this eerie world.

item.title: Elite Dangerous
item.description: Game Description Elite Dangerous is an online multiplayer game, the third part of the “Elite” franchise, which began in 1984. The player is given complete freedom to explore and travel, and has the opportunity to influence the storyline. The action takes place thousands of years later in the distant future on the territory of several million star galaxies. Most of the stars, planets, asteroids and other cosmic bodies that exist in the real world.

item.title: Cities: Skylines
item.description: Game Description The city-planning simulator - Cities: Skylines - is in the best traditions of the real game, in which its own physical laws were created to transfer them into gaming reality. On the territory of your new city, it will be taken into account that the profile road is built in one way, and the road at the airport - in another. It will count if you correctly lay the pipeline for the heating system, and also if you can show people that they live in a real paradise, and not just a metropolis where they want to buy them at the expense of shopping centers.

item.title: Dying Light
item.description: Game Description A terrible virus grows into a global problem in Dying Light. Starting from the city of Harran in Latin America, the infection is decimating the entire world, turning those infected into the walking dead. The hero must survive in such circumstances and try to correct the situation. As an undercover operative, Kyle Crane receives his most important assignment. He needs to find a guy named Suleiman in order to take away from him an important file that he stole.

item.title: Geometry Dash
item.description: Game Description Geometry Dash is a 2D arcade game aimed at hardcore level completion. You will take control of a unique character, which can be in the form of a geometric figure, to pass the most difficult levels and open up new opportunities in the gameplay. Here you will find more than 100 original and challenging missions, as well as the opportunity to create your own main character and share your results on the leaderboard.

item.title: Assetto Corsa
item.description: Game Description Assetto Corsa is a car simulator developed based on test drives of cars using a model of real behavior. Includes both single player and multiplayer modes. The developers presented a variety of licensed cars and tracks, which were specially digitized specifically for the race to convey maximum authenticity to their prototypes. The machines can be customized to your individual taste, because… the creators have added an extensive set of settings and support for modifications.

item.title: The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth
item.description: Game Description The Binding of Isaac: Rebirth is a remake of the original title, allowing you to embark on exciting adventures with additional innovations and improved graphics. The game has been optimized, allowing for stable FPS on most devices. The picture looks more colorful, thanks to hand-drawn pixel characters and environments that increase the quality of the visual component. The effects of shots and enemy deaths have become more detailed, creating tangible dynamics on the battlefield.

item.title: Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor
item.description: Game Description The main character - Middle-earth: Shadow of Mordor - will fight Sauron and avenge his family. One day, Sauron kidnapped Talion to sacrifice him and summon Celebrimbor, the spirit of the main elf in the world of the Lord of the Rings. However, this spirit helps Talion to resurrect, gives him new abilities and sends him into battle. The protagonist’s enemies are Sauron and his dark lords: the Hammer, the Black Hand and the Tower.

item.title: Metro 2033 Redux
item.description: Game Description Metro 2033 Redux is a first-person shooter with a deep story and horror elements. The developers questioned not the simple existence of people underground, but the relationships between them. Has the main threat always been with us, in people? In the world of the post-apocalypse, we play as a character named Artem. He grew up underground, in the Moscow metro. In 2013, the world was hit by the terrible consequences of the latest epidemic.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls Online
item.description: Game Description The game The Elder Scrolls Online offers you to go through a number of locations for several warring factions, playing both alone and in real time with other players. The plot tells how Molag Bal, known as the Prince of Violence, decides to take over the entire kingdom of Tamriel and enslave ordinary citizens. The gamer will have to face the forces of evil and defeat him. Throughout the game world of The Elder Scrolls Online, there are several factions available, each of which is endowed with certain properties.

item.title: South Park: The Stick of Truth (game)
item.description: Game Description The funny events of South Park take us into the world of the game South Park: The Stick of Truth, where we play the role of a newcomer who has ambitions and a desire to build a circle of friends in a new city. As soon as we enter the game, famous fourth graders start swinging swords and casting random spells. One of these brings chaos and evil into this world, which we have to cope with.

item.title: One Finger Death Punch
item.description: Game Description One finger death punch is an arcade fighting game in the style of beat’em up, in which you can feel like a real martial arts master. In this game we have to fight off crowds of enemies that have surrounded the main character and are advancing from opposite sides. The game design is made in 2D, and all the characters are drawn people, which adds simplicity to the game, but at the same time makes it unusual.

item.title: Insurgency
item.description: Game Description Insurgency is a first-person shooter, in which the developers focused on playing in cooperative or multiplayer mode, about the Iraq War. The protagonist is a member of the US PMC, and he is fighting against Iraqi insurgents. The player chooses one side at the beginning of the match, and after that a brutal fight begins between the two factions. The basis of the game is a confrontation between two teams, which include 16 people.

item.title: Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance
item.description: Game Description Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance is a plot branch from the original universe of the recognized genius Hideo Kojima. The game is in the slasher genre, unlike other Metal Gear projects. The plot is dedicated to the story of the cyber ninja Raiden, the protagonist of the second part. 4 years have passed since the collapse of the evil Sons of Patriots corporation. The military units, given freedom of action, plunged the world into chaos and constant divisions of power zones.

item.title: Kingdom Rush
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Rush is a project in the “tower defense” genre, in the style of the Middle Ages, interspersed with magic, creatures that do not exist in real life, like trolls, and real-time control of heroes with a choice of the direction and course of their attacks. This game received recognition on many platforms and later reached personal computers. The gameplay is standard for the genre, the advantage over other projects is the refined balance and exciting, moderately difficult levels that challenge and force you to change battle tactics and constantly be on the alert.

item.title: The Walking Dead: Season 2
item.description: Game Description The Walking Dead: The Game. Season 2 – the continuation of the “Walking Dead” franchise does not lag behind the first part and begins its story 2 years after the previous events. Now in The Walking Dead: Season Two, the user plays as a 10-year-old girl, Clementine, who is once again trying to find shelter and survive in a mortal world filled with living corpses. Having lost all his old friends, a brave child begins a journey on his own.

item.title: The Wolf Among Us
item.description: Game Description The Wolf Among Us is an episodic graphic novel based on the Fable comics series created by Bill Willingham. The game’s plot acts as a prequel to the main story. The game is divided into 5 episodes, where every decision made by the player has a consequence and affects the overall one. history. The gameplay is point-and-click, but some sections contain action and fights, which are QTE scenes. All the characters presented in the game are heroes of famous fairy tales, who, with the help of spells, can exist in the world of people or “Simps”, as they are called here.

item.title: Arma 3
item.description: Game Description In Arma 3 we regain our independence by playing as a neutral side of this war. Inside the universe of the third Arma - 2030. Key opponents are still fighting for independence in economic and commodity terms. Among the enemies, a new structural organization CSAT appears, acting as a military-political alliance. While the crisis rages in Europe, the United States is at odds with China in the Pacific.

item.title: Outlast (+Whistleblower)
item.description: Game Description Outlast (+Whistleblower) - DLC for the game of the same name, which added more content and a new storyline. The addition contains a backstory of the events that happened in the original, where Miles Upshur played the game. The journalist went to the Mount Massive mental hospital, where, for information received, there were many violations. Here he encountered a crowd of terrible psychos - monsters who had taken over the hospital.

item.title: Total War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition
item.description: Game Description In Total War: ROME 2 - Emperor Edition we are allowed to play as one of Caesar’s three followers. This is Octavian, the adopted son of a former ruler who is obliged to become the ruler of Rome; Mark Antony is Caesar’s loyal friend and best military leader; and Lepidus, the man through whom Caesar achieved universal recognition. After Caesar was killed, chaos erupted within the Roman Empire. The foreign policy of the empire maintained proper balance, while civil war was taking place inside, and the territory was divided into three parts.

item.title: PayDay 2
item.description: Game Description Re-join the PayDay 2 gang as Dallas, Hoxton, Chains or Wolfe, who have come to Washington to rob and make a lot of money. Put the mask on your favorite hero and set off to carry out your next crime, in which you will need to overcome many obstacles before reaching your goal. Now you will have a wide variety of contracts to choose from, from which you can choose any one.

item.title: Age of Empires 2
item.description: Game Description Age of Empires 2 is a re-release of the classic real-time strategy game with many different improvements. Many years later, this game still remains unique and serves as an example for many strategy developers to follow. In the game, the player will have to take control of a small settlement of a certain faction and lead it to victory and prosperity. Events take place in the Middle Ages, roughly starting from the fall of the Roman Empire and up to the Renaissance.

item.title: BioShock Infinite
item.description: Game Description BioShock Infinite is a first-person shooter with multiple mechanics of a role-playing adventure in the style of science fiction and steampunk. The game will take place in 1912 in an alternative universe, in the flying city of the United States of America - Columbia. You need to control the private detective Booker Devitt, who has a task to find a cute girl named Elizabeth. Immediately after it is found, the main characters find themselves in the very epicenter of the war.

item.title: Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Tomb Raider is a restart of the series telling about the adventures of Lara Croft. The ship on which the girl’s crew was sailing was wrecked. On the island she is captured and left tied in a cave. The adventurer frees herself from her bonds and goes to look for the crew members. The player can choose the difficulty, which affects the course of battles. A vast world opens up before the gamer, divided into several locations.

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter - Far Cry 3 - will teach you how to survive in the wild conditions of the open world, more or less value relationships with good people, and show you what real madness is. The series rewarded us with enough action, showing that a huge arsenal of weapons is just part of what can be given to players in return for their desire to enjoy a completely open world and a good story.

item.title: Super Hexagon
item.description: Game Description Super Hexagon does not contain any plot. This is a dynamic arcade game with a top view. From the outside it looks like an endless game. But in fact, it can be passed. It will not be easy to reach the end, since the title is very hardcore. The project uses a minimalistic visual style. The gameplay is about survival in the arena. In Super Hexagon it is hexagonal in shape.

item.title: Hotline Miami
item.description: Game Description Hotline Miami is a 2D top-down action game created by two incredibly hardworking and talented young people under the auspices of the same computer game development studio - Dennaton Games. The international release of this project took place in October 2012. The developers admitted that they took their inspiration from the Hollywood crime action films of the 80s. The game, as the name implies, takes place in the city of Miami, in the first half of the 80s.

item.title: Castle Crashers
item.description: Game Description Castle Crashers is an arcade action game in which players will take control of powerful characters and fight monsters. Create a squad by choosing from 25 characters to fight your way through castles against your enemies. Compete with other users or monsters living throughout the continent. The plot will unfold at a ball in the king’s castle. During the fun, an evil sorcerer stole a precious magic stone and four princesses, who must be rescued by the knights and fight the enemy.

item.title: Borderlands 2
item.description: Game Description Borderlands 2 is a shooter with a view from the perspective of the protagonist and leveling up abilities and passive improvements, as in the role-playing adventure genre. A direct continuation of the story of the original game. The main differences from the first part are a greater emphasis on the plot component and the addition of a more advanced weapon editor with many possible modifications that open up as you progress.

item.title: Batman: Arkham City
item.description: Game Description Batman: Arkham City is an action-adventure game with a third-person view, based on one of the most popular heroes of comics, cartoons, films and toys, Batman. This project is an expanded edition of the original game. The media product was developed by Rocksteady Studios. The official release took place in early autumn 2012. The game world is five times larger in area than in the previous Batman: Arkham Asylum.

item.title: The Walking Dead: Season One
item.description: Game Description The Walking Dead: Season One is an interactive story divided into 6 episodes with elements of a point-n-click adventure and with QTEs in action scenes, telling the story of Lee Everett, a prisoner who was being transported in a police station when the zombie apocalypse began. car to another place of serving his sentence, but due to an attack on the vehicle by the dead, he managed to escape.

item.title: Saints Row: The Third
item.description: Game Description The Third Street Saints are a large and large group in the universe of the game Saints Row: The Third. The third-person shooter with its crazy plots gave the game’s heroes their own brand of sneakers, a carbonated drink and a logo, and now they have to fight the world’s largest crime syndicate, whose people are scattered around the world and do their work in the “shadows”. Since the main characters have long captured Stillwater, the Syndicate demands offerings from them in the form of tribute for the criminal leadership.

item.title: The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim
item.description: Game Description The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim is rightfully considered a legendary game. Even now, many years after its release, it continues to conquer new users who come to it based on recommendations or out of their own interest. In the role of a warrior named Dovahkiin, the gamer will find himself in a huge world full of mysteries, unexpected turns and battles. Here it is not possible to follow the path of a straightforward passage.

item.title: Terraria
item.description: Game Description Terraria is a simulator of construction, life, survival, an interesting storyline and everything that could be combined into a game with the Sand Box style. Simple 8-bit graphics take us into a randomly generated world generated by the game itself. The open map is almost endless if you dig deep into the world, but you will be stopped by armies of monsters or underground knights. Terraria is not as simple as it seems.

item.title: The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings
item.description: Game Description The computer game “The Witcher 2 Assassins of Kings” is an expanded limited edition of the impressive continuation of the 2008 giant of the world of role-playing video games “The Witcher”. The development of this project was carried out by the famous studio CD PROJEKT RED. The announcement came in May 2011. Geralt of Rivia is the greatest of the line of witchers, wielding a sword better than others, almost the only one who can resist the forces of darkness, while being something between an ordinary person and a monster.

item.title: Portal 2
item.description: Game Description The first-person puzzle game Portal 2 received an official announcement only in the spring of 2011, after several postponements. This project is a direct continuation of the original part, which received the highest reviews from critics and gamers around the world. The game was developed by the legendary company Valve, which needs no introduction. The game’s plot continues the line begun in the first part of the “Portal” series.

item.title: Mount and Blade: Warband
item.description: Game Description Mount & Blade: Warband is a standalone add-on that brings many improvements and innovations to the game. New textures, object and character models, as well as sophisticated visualization settings. Change FSAA anti-aliasing, tone mapping and other effects in the settings. Modernized animations, improved combat system and the spirit of the heroes. People will flee if they are in imminent danger or, conversely, fight to the last if their morality is high.

item.title: Batman: Arkham Asylum Game of the Year Edition
item.description: Game Description In Batman: Arkham Asylum the protagonist will still have to fight the Scarecrow, capture territories that belonged to the Joker or other villains, and in return we will be treated to 4 new maps: Crime Alley, Scarecrow’s Nightmare, Night Stalker and Complete Madness. The founder of the legendary series, Batman: Arkham Asylum is a stealth action game with a third-person view and an open world. In the role of the Dark Knight of Gotham, the gamer can freely explore the Arkham psychiatric hospital and the island on which it is located, fight enemies using a convenient and spectacular combat system, and an arsenal of all kinds of gadgets.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.description: Game Description In Left 4 Dead 2 we have a choice between 4 characters. The coach is a massive African American; Nick is an avid gambler, a trickster and a master of theft; Rochelle is a black 29-year-old Depeche Mode fan and journalist; Ellis is a racing fan and car enthusiast. The cooperative first-person shooter captivated many players for several years, providing ample ground for exterminating zombies in 5 game campaigns, which take place in swamps, cities, caves and closed locations.

item.title: LEGO Star Wars - The Complete Saga
item.description: Game Description LEGO Star Wars - The Complete Saga is the legendary LEGO game based on the Star Wars universe. The player is given a unique opportunity to become a participant in the events of his favorite film epic, feel all the experiences of the heroes and choose the Dark or Light Side. All LEGO games have cartoon graphics, which is beneficial and creates the right atmosphere. The gameplay cannot be called varied, but it does not get boring.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 1
item.description: Game Description The first part of Left 4 Dead has 6 campaigns, several levels in each. The history and chronology of the chapters are interconnected, which will prevent the gamer from getting confused in the plot. At the beginning of each area, characters will appear at a checkpoint, where they can pick up weapons and ammunition and set off on their further journey. The United States of America has been gripped by an unknown virus that turns people into terrible monsters with bouts of aggression and rage.

item.title: Half-Life 2: Episode Two
item.description: Game Description The open world of the newly released Half-Life 2: Episode Two at one time created a stir all over the world. Openly moving with one goal - to deliver information about the Alliance to the Resistance base - was a shocking task that players rushed into one after another. In the first-person shooter, we will continue to play as Gordon Freeman with Alixa Vance. Long journeys in the game are accompanied by frequent changes of scenes: now we are fighting against mutants, now we are solving puzzles, now we are watching an interactive film about the characters’ journey and their conversations.

item.title: Portal
item.description: Game Description Portal is a first-person adventure puzzle game. The plot takes place in the Aperture scientific laboratory, into which the main character, Chell, ended up. She is the one who must test a new weapon that allows you to create portals. Throughout the entire passage, the heroine will be pursued by the GLaDOS robot, telling her what to do and where to go. The first levels will be educational, they will tell you how to use the device.

item.title: Garry's Mod
item.description: Game Description Garry’s Mod is a game and physics sandbox. The main game mode is aimless and provides the player with a freely customizable world powered by the Source engine. The player creates non-player characters with various interaction objects. Special tools and tools allow you to construct new objects in reality, fix beams, iron, objects. Changing facial expressions is also available. Thanks to the flexible engine, users create their own modifications: Spacebuild, Wiremod, Elevator: Source, DarkRP, Prop Hunt and others.

item.title: STAR WARS Empire at War - Gold Pack
item.description: Game Description STAR WARS Empire at War - Gold Pack is a collection of real-time strategies based on the Star Wars plot. You will play the role of an army manager on one of the sides in an intergalactic civil war. Command units of the Empire, Rebels, Republic or other civilizations. In Star Wars Empire at War, you will command your team, completing tasks and freeing planets from enemies. Visit Tatooine, Kashyyyk, Dagobah or other hot spots in the galaxy.

item.title: Half-Life 2
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter, which instantly became the voice of the generation - Half-Life 2 - gave players hope for the third part. The game has received so many awards that there is no point in describing them in the context of the description. The plot reveals to us the continuation of the first part. Gordon Freeman takes up his mount again, but now the graphics have become more realistic, there are more locations, and the plot is even deeper.

item.title: Counter-Strike: Source
item.description: Game Description Emerging as a worthy competitor to its previous installment, Counter-Strike: Source is an updated version 1.6 in which players found both disadvantages and advantages. For example, in the new part, many weapons have a completely different bullet spread, which is why players had to get used to it for a long time. The ballistics and shooting technique have not changed, but the graphics and the “atmosphere of an open location” added additional charm to the game for fans of the first-person shooter.

item.title: POSTAL 2
item.description: Game Description POSTAL 2 is a first-person shooter full of dark humor, references, blood and other hardcore stuff like desecrating graves or putting cats on a machine gun as a silencer. The plot develops in a strange town - Paradise. The main character of Postal 2 will be a character named Dude. He tries to live an ordinary life without doing anything illegal. At the beginning of the story, he gets a job at the computer game development office Running with Scissors.

item.title: Counter-Strike
item.description: Game Description Counter-strike is a legendary multiplayer shooter, the founder of one of the most popular series in the history of the gaming industry. The concept is simple but ingenious. Two teams - terrorists and special forces - are trying to destroy each other on the map. Terrorists have the ability to plant a bomb at one of the key points. and the counterterrorism department tries to predict which point the opponents will attack.

item.title: Half-Life (1998)
item.description: Game Description Half-Life (1998) - sci-fi shooter. One of the first games where the plot was completely presented using cutscenes in the engine. One of the main features of Half-Life was the artificial intelligence of enemies, which was striking in its elaboration. The story of Half-Life begins at the Black Mesa research facility in the mountains of New Mexico. Control takes place for the young physicist Gordon Freeman, who is researching anomalous materials.

item.title: Coven
item.description: Game Description Going to the gloomy world of Coven, you have to deal with a large number of enemy creatures and deal with their elimination. The universe takes you into an atmospheric medieval fantasy world, where witches and other mythical creatures live alongside people. The first episode is available in the game, where you will take on the role of a young girl. The heroine is burned at the stake during the 1600s, mistaken for a witch and a fiend.

item.title: Instinct
item.description: Game Description The shooter Instinct tells an alternative story of the events that took place in the Yangangdo Mountains, which took place in reality on September 13, 2004. The developers had their own version, which they used as the basis for the game. A strange explosion occurs in a North Korean province called Yangangdo. Terrible experiments were carried out in secret laboratories located near a huge mountain. During the research, scientists tested an alien virus called Instinct.

item.title: Neuro
item.description: Game Description Neuro is a three-dimensional action game that gives the player the feeling of being inside a fictional world in the role of a psionicist who can use his abilities for combat purposes. The story told in this brainchild of the developers “Revolt Games” is a prequel to their other project called “Homeplanet”. The last missions of the single-player campaign develop in parallel with the start of their last game.

item.title: 7 Days to Die
item.description: Game Description In 7 Days to Die you will need the ability to loot, kill other players, take loot, build buildings, craft items, shoot accurately and keep track of time, because in the open world there is a night in which zombies and other undead sharpen their attention . A horror first-person shooter that combines city building, multiplayer, survival, tower defense and character leveling in an RPG style. Despite the fact that a severe epidemic has struck the world, you will be able to kill animals to take their meat and skin.

item.title: Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Action RPG Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms takes the player into the magical Middle Ages. The story begins in the Valley of Storms - a place where four legendary peoples intersect: Humans, Elves, Dwarves and Orcs. It is here that the cruel god Alaloth is imprisoned. From the very kingdom of the dead, he poisons all kingdoms with his evil. Soon monsters, storms, diseases and mighty dragons will strike this world.

item.title: Batman: Arkham Knight
item.description: Game Description In Batman: Arkham Knight - a third-person action game, we eliminate this problem, and the Scarecrow himself too. After the events of the last part of Batman, Gotham City finally has a normal, friendly environment. Fights, robberies and murders continue, but if the protagonist does not hear about them, it means that everything is covered up by the police, or these are just rumors. Suddenly the Scarecrow appears and says that during the last incident he only used 100 grams of his drug.

item.title: BattleBlock Theater
item.description: Game Description BattleBlock Theater is a platformer with cartoon graphics and a side view. It has a simple plot, because it is far from the main one in this genre. The player takes on the role of a prisoner who goes through various levels of the theater with one goal - to save Hatty Hattington. The gameplay is not complicated at first glance: level progression is linear, jumps are simple and standard for the genre, and there are a couple of types of enemy attacks.

item.title: Blade and Sorcery
item.description: Game Description Blade and Sorcery is a first-person fantasy action game focused on realistic hand-to-hand combat physics. You play as a hero who knows how to fight with melee and long-range weapons, as well as magical abilities. There are three classes to choose from: Warrior, Ranger and Wizard. The gameplay is adapted for virtual reality helmets Valve Index, HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Windows Mixed Reality. The gameplay is based on body physics and fair hitboxes.

item.title: Bodycam
item.description: Game Description Bodycam throws you headlong into a hyper-realistic multiplayer battlefield. Powered by Unreal Engine 5, this all-new shooter promises a next-gen experience that will redefine your expectations. Teamwork is key here. Every bullet counts, and the victory or defeat of your squad depends on your every decision. Forget playing Rambo. Bodycam requires strategic thinking and coordinated attacks. Team up with your teammates, map out a plan of action, and use your arsenal to outmaneuver your opponents.

item.title: Brotato
item.description: Game Description In the shooter Bratato you have to take control of a potato using a variety of guns while fighting alien creatures. The gameplay includes roguelite genre elements. Locations are procedurally generated, and each run can take up to 30 minutes of real time. There are dozens of types of weapons and additional items of equipment to choose from, allowing you to progress at your own pace and combine the effects of items.

item.title: Clone Drone in the Danger Zone
item.description: Game Description Clone Drone in the Danger Zone is an exciting arcade game in which the player will play as a person whose mind has been transferred into an iron robot! The player enters the arena with the only task - to survive. It is worth considering that each opponent is endowed with individual characteristics and skills, so winning will not be easy. Each blow is under the close attention of a robot commentator, who will cover the course of the battle and your actions throughout it.

item.title: Company of Heroes 2
item.description: Game Description The events of Company of Heroes 2 unfold before us in snowy Norilsk, where one of the largest Stalinist Gulags is located. NKVD officer Churkin comes here, who understands that he will not survive the next Stalinist purge of officers. In the Gulag he finds his comrade from the front, who is serving his sentence and preparing to be shot. Isakovich is the name of the character, he wrote a tome with the real actions of the commanders of the Red Army, for which he was sentenced to death.

item.title: Cruelty Squad
item.description: Game Description Cruelty Squad is an immersive simulator that includes elements of stealth and first-person shooter. You will need to penetrate the depths of a high-tech corporation to stop its atrocities. A huge arsenal of weapons is available, including shotguns, darts, pistols, launchers and much more. The difficulty increases with each new stage. It is necessary to take part in intense firefights with a huge number of different enemies. It is possible to emerge victorious from a fight without death.

item.title: Dave The Diver
item.description: Game Description Dave The Diver - a sea adventure about a diver named Dave. Events take place in a mysterious place called the Blue Hole. During the day, the protagonist explores the ocean, diving to the very bottom in search of treasures, and at night he manages a sushi restaurant. Dave is partnered with 3 charismatic friends to help him on his adventures. Each character has an individual character, introducing dynamics into the relationships between the characters.

item.title: Dead by Daylight
item.description: Game Description Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical cooperative horror game inspired by youth slashers. The story centers on four survivors facing off against a fifth player who controls a bloodthirsty maniac. The defending team’s job is to do everything possible to ensure they aren’t dead by dawn. Finding yourself in the same location with the killer, you need to use the environment and interact with your partners, trying to resist the monster.

item.title: Detroit Become Human
item.description: Game Description Detroit: Become Human is a rather interesting game in the interactive cinema genre. It is based on the Quantic Dream graphics core, so the excellent graphics component immediately catches your eye. It is impossible not to note the titanic work of the animators, who created truly gorgeous animations and scenes that were plausible from the point of view of anatomy and physics. The game takes place in the future, in an era of highly developed technology, where androids have already firmly taken their place next to people as loyal and multifunctional humanoid servants.

item.title: Duck Game
item.description: Game Description Duck Game is an action game developed by Landon Podbielski and published by Adult Swim Games. You can play alone or with friends online. Duck Game gives us both options. The game received extremely positive reviews from both professional critics and gamers, as well as from ordinary people. A simple 2D fighting game with multiplayer simply couldn’t get bad reviews. True, some are indignant about the name of the game because the name, according to some players, does not reflect anything.

item.title: Gunpoint
item.description: Game Description Gunpoint takes the user to the near future, where many interesting spy things have been invented. Richard Conway works as a spy for hire, performing a variety of tasks. One day he gets a special copy - hyperpants. This item of clothing helps you jump over huge distances, and also help you fall from a height without harm to your health. The protagonist receives a new task - to investigate the murder of an employee of a weapons company.

item.title: Hearts of Iron 4
item.description: Game Description Despite the fact that Hearts of Iron 4 is famous for its realism, the new part has completely redesigned the focus tree for individual countries and nationalities. The strategy, dedicated to the Second World War, invites you to play in countries such as Italy, Ethiopia, Spain, Japan and China. Two scenarios that differ in their dates: 1936 and 1939. In one of them you will take part in the Second Italo-Ethiopian War and the Spanish Civil War, and in the second you will see how Japan invaded China, and the Second World War was fought.

item.title: Human: Fall Flat
item.description: Game Description Human: Fall Flat is an adventure puzzle game with amazing physics and engine. Take control of Bob, who every time has a dream from which he must find a way out. Usually such dreams are accompanied by colorful locations in which he needs to get to a certain point and solve many difficult problems. Explore the open world in your own way. Climb any building, rock, tree or other object, going through the same place differently each time.

item.title: INSIDE
item.description: Game Description A side-view platformer - INSIDE - tells the story of a small and unarmed boy who, through an unknown means, ended up in a closed, scary space. The physics of the game and the gameplay invite us to go through the platformer to the last level with a lot of deaths, puzzles, solving difficult problems and good visuals, combined with the atmosphere and the usual soundtrack. The death of our hero is an endlessly scary animation.

item.title: It's Only Money
item.description: Game Description It’s Only Money will immerse gamers in the realistic story of a resident of the underworld, who, by order of the mayor of Rockhaven, was thrown into a huge pit. But don’t despair! Together with other inhabitants of the underground, you can return to the surface and begin your path to wealth and power. You must steal from the rich, fight tycoons, and regain control of the city block by block.

item.title: Just Shapes & Beats
item.description: Game Description Just Shapes & Beats offers gameplay based on the sound of music and beats. The difficulty level of the game depends on the rhythm of the soundtrack. The user takes control of a blue square; Many difficulties await him ahead. In the process, the hero is helped by friends, with whom he fights enemies. The game supports online and local co-op with 4 players in Story Mode and Challenge Runs.

item.title: Legend of Mortal
item.description: Game Description In Legend of Mortal you have to become a nobody in the Tang Man sector. Not a prophetic hero, not a legendary warrior - you’re just trying to survive in a world on the edge of the abyss. But even lowlifes have it tough, right? This is what Legend of Mortal is all about: your decisions determine the fate of you and those around you. Think of it this way: every meeting, every battle, every seemingly insignificant conversation is a twist in the kaleidoscope.

item.title: LOCKDOWN Protocol
item.description: Game Description LOCKDOWN Protocol throws players into a high-stakes world of deception and cooperation. The title combines real-time action and communication, creating a dynamic experience for groups of three to eight people. The idea is simple: players cooperate to complete tasks within a strict time limit. Beneath the surface of unity, however, lies a sinister undercurrent. Trust is a fragile commodity in this environment. Every interaction offers a chance to gather information or sow discord.

item.title: Muse Dash
item.description: Game Description Muse Dash is a dynamic rhythm game in anime style, where you will visit many colorful locations, dance to the rhythm of fiery songs and send enemies into outer space. At the center of the story are three charismatic beauties. Having chosen one of the heroines, you need to fight with various creatures in the rhythm of the dance. The action will take place on a colorful background accompanied by dynamic dance music.

item.title: Neon White
item.description: Game Description Neon White is a first-person adventure platformer with card game elements. The gameplay stands out for its incredible dynamics and speed. It is necessary to quickly react to situations and the environment, because enemies, traps, obstacles and other dangers await you at every turn. Events develop behind the pearly gates of Paradise. The task in the game is simple and trivial - you need to destroy all the demons in Heaven.

item.title: Outer Wilds
item.description: Game Description Outer Wilds is a first-person action-adventure game based on the popular Groundhog Day theme. Events take place on the fictional planet Kamelok, which is destroyed by a star explosion 22 minutes after the start of the game. But the story is just beginning. The user finds himself in a “time loop”, which allows you to gradually develop the plot, travel through the planetary system and meet new characters. After a “reboot” of life, all accumulated information remains available.

item.title: Raft
item.description: Game Description Raft is a first-person survival sandbox in which the player will have to survive on a small raft and explore new lands. The main character will begin his journey by waking up hungry and dehydrated on a small wreck of a ship. Get food and drink by catching garbage floating past the hero on the waves. To catch the item, you can use the hook. Find useful items and materials to craft a mug, light a fire, and filter sea water.

item.title: Sea of ​​Thieves
item.description: Game Description Sea of ​​Thieves – seas, ships and a bottle of rum. Immerse yourself in the world of piracy, ship battles, treasure hunting and fun. Create your character, team up with other players, and assemble a team of pirates. A huge open world opens up before you, full of riddles, secrets and adventures. The gameplay of Sea of ​​Thieves is rich in content: The endless ocean and deserted islands - assemble a team of your kind, surf the seas and oceans enjoying the sunset over the waves, sing pirate songs and drink strong rum from barrels in the hold.

item.title: Starbound
item.description: Game Description Starbound is a 2D side-scrolling indie RPG adventure with graphics that reference the classic 8-bit titles of the last century. The project has become widespread thanks to the ability to play with a friend in co-op mode on different platforms, as well as a well-developed system of achievements and rewards that motivate you to improve your own skills and collect all kinds of items for crafting and collecting. The surrounding world is presented in the form of open territories, where there are no prohibitions on colonizing unknown planets or performing secondary tasks; you can even not touch the story campaign at all.

item.title: Stray
item.description: Game Description Stray takes the player to the distant future, the world of cyberpunk. The story follows the adventures of a lost cat looking for his way home. A stray animal found itself in the fortified city of Kowloon, from which it is not easy to find a way out. People have not lived here for a long time, and the streets are filled with robots. Find out the secrets of a long-abandoned settlement.

item.title: TEKKEN 7
item.description: Game Description TEKKEN 7 is a side-scrolling 3D fighting game that tells the true story of the Mishima clan’s feud. In the storyline we learn why Heitachi killed his wife, for what reasons Kazuya Mishima survived. The basis of the game’s action is a fighting game based on love, family relationships with friendly fights. Each battle in Tekken 7 is a separate branch in the plot, so after the end of the battle (victory in it), we see a small interactive video of the creation of the entire universe, Kazuya growing up, and the formation of the Mishima clan.

item.title: Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends
item.description: Game Description Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends is a dynamic and bloody fighting game, the action of which takes place in an alternative version of our reality, where characters from books, urban legends, cryptozoology, mythology and folklore exist. All heroes of Terrordrome are monsters and villains. The game shows a hypothetical world where all the scary stories heard turned out to be true. There is a story campaign for Alex Van Helsing.

item.title: Wayfinder
item.description: Game Description Wayfinder is an online action role-playing adventure game in which gamers become Wayfinders, using unique abilities to fight the hostile force that has taken over their world. The game emphasizes co-op, allowing users to team up with friends to enhance their abilities and manage their adventures. The world of Evenor, in which the action takes place, has been destroyed, and gamers will have to navigate it, collecting valuable materials and creating items that will help them in their search.

item.title: Wobbly Life
item.description: Game Description Wobbly Life is a bright and dynamic sandbox that relies on an open world and body physics. The gameplay is tailored for local and online co-op. Team up with friends to compete in various mini-games and competitions. There is a single-player game aimed at developing your hero. Earn money and spend it on new skins, clothes, equipment and much more. You will explore the vastness of Wobbly Island, controlling cute characters that resemble children’s toys.
